00221 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00222 //    EditScreenInit
00223 //
00224 //    This function is called once at SGP (and game) startup
00225 //
00226 UINT32 EditScreenInit(void)
00227 {  
00228       gfFakeLights = FALSE;
00229 
00230       eInfo.fGameInit = TRUE;
00231       GameInitEditorBuildingInfo();
00232       GameInitEditorMercsInfo();
00233 
00234       //Set the editor colors.
00235       //gusEditorTaskbarColor = 9581;
00236       //gusEditorTaskbarColor =           Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB(  72,  88, 104 ) );
00237       //gusEditorTaskbarHiColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 136, 138, 135 ) );
00238       //gusEditorTaskbarLoColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB(  24,  61,  81 ) );
00239       
00240       gusEditorTaskbarColor   = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB(  65,  79,  94 ) );
00241       gusEditorTaskbarHiColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 122, 124, 121 ) );
00242       gusEditorTaskbarLoColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB(  22,  55,  73 ) );
00243 
00244       InitClipboard();
00245 
00246       InitializeRoadMacros();
00247 
00248       InitArmyGunTypes();
00249 
00250       return TRUE;
00251 }

00268 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00269 //    EditModeInit
00270 //
00271 //    Editor's Init code. Called each time we enter edit mode from the game.
00272 //
00273 BOOLEAN EditModeInit( void )
00274 {
00275       UINT32 x;
00276       INT32 i;
00277       SGPPaletteEntry   LColors[2];
00278 
00279       OutputDebugString( "Entering editor mode...\n" );
00280 
00281 
00282       gfRealGunNut = gGameOptions.fGunNut;
00283       gGameOptions.fGunNut = TRUE;
00284 
00285 
00286       if( !gfProfileDataLoaded )
00287             LoadMercProfiles();
00288 
00289       ClearTacticalMessageQueue( );
00290 
00291       PauseGame();
00292       fEditModeFirstTime = FALSE;
00293 
00294       DisableButtonHelpTextRestore();
00295       
00296       if( fFirstTimeInEditModeInit )
00297       {
00298             if( gfWorldLoaded )
00299                   InitJA2SelectionWindow();
00300             fFirstTimeInEditModeInit = FALSE;
00301       }
00302 
00303       //Initialize editor specific stuff for each Taskbar.
00304       EntryInitEditorTerrainInfo();
00305       EntryInitEditorItemsInfo();
00306       EntryInitEditorMercsInfo();
00307 
00308       LightGetColors( LColors );
00309       gEditorLightColor = LColors[0];
00310 
00311       //essentially, we are turning the game off so the game doesn't process in conjunction with the
00312       //editor.
00313       guiSaveTacticalStatusFlags = (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ~DEMOMODE);
00314       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= ~REALTIME;
00315       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= TURNBASED | SHOW_ALL_ITEMS;
00316       gTacticalStatus.uiTimeOfLastInput = GetJA2Clock();
00317       gTacticalStatus.uiTimeSinceDemoOn = gTacticalStatus.uiTimeOfLastInput;
00318       gTacticalStatus.fGoingToEnterDemo = FALSE;
00319 
00320       //Remove the radar from the interface.
00321       RemoveCurrentTacticalPanelButtons( );
00322       MSYS_DisableRegion(&gRadarRegion);
00323 
00324       CreateEditorTaskbar();
00325       
00326       //Hide all of the buttons here.  DoTaskbar() will handle the 
00327       //showing and hiding of the buttons.
00328       for( x = LAST_EDITORTAB_BUTTON+1; x < NUMBER_EDITOR_BUTTONS; x++ )
00329             HideButton( iEditorButton[x] );
00330 
00331       iEditorToolbarState = iPrevJA2ToolbarState;
00332       iDrawMode = iPrevDrawMode;
00333       CurrentPaste = PrevCurrentPaste;
00334       gCurrentBackground = gPrevCurrentBackground;
00335 
00336       iCurrentTaskbar = TASK_NONE;
00337       iTaskMode = iOldTaskMode;
00338 
00339       DoTaskbar();
00340 
00341       fDontUseRandom = FALSE;
00342       fSelectionWindow = FALSE;
00343 
00344       // Set renderer to ignore redundency
00345       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= NOHIDE_REDUNDENCY;
00346 
00347       fHelpScreen = FALSE;
00348 
00349       gfEditMode = TRUE;
00350       fNewMap = FALSE;
00351 
00352       gfEditingDoor = FALSE;
00353 
00354       gusGameLightLevel = LightGetAmbient();
00355       if( !gfBasement && !gfCaves )
00356             gusLightLevel =  12;//EDITOR_LIGHT_MAX - (UINT16)LightGetAmbient();
00357       else
00358             gusLightLevel = EDITOR_LIGHT_MAX - (UINT16)LightGetAmbient();
00359       
00360       if( gfFakeLights )
00361       {
00362             gusSavedLightLevel = gusLightLevel;
00363             gusLightLevel = EDITOR_LIGHT_FAKE;
00364             ClickEditorButton( MAPINFO_TOGGLE_FAKE_LIGHTS );                        
00365       }
00366 
00367       gfRenderWorld = TRUE;
00368       gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
00369       
00370       //Reset the corruption detection flags.
00371       gfCorruptMap = FALSE;
00372       gfCorruptSchedules = FALSE;
00373 
00374       // save old scrolling mode, set renderer to not use video scroll
00375       gfOldDoVideoScroll = gfDoVideoScroll;
00376       gubOldCurScrollSpeedID = gubCurScrollSpeedID;
00377       /// set new ones
00378 
00379       gfRoofPlacement = FALSE;
00380 
00381       EnableUndo();
00382       
00383       RemoveMercsInSector( );
00384       if( gfWorldLoaded )
00385       {
00386             gfConfirmExitFirst = TRUE;
00387             ShowEntryPoints();
00388             PrepareSchedulesForEditorEntry();
00389             if( gfMercResetUponEditorEntry )
00390             {
00391                   UseEditorOriginalList();
00392                   ResetAllMercPositions();
00393             }
00394             else
00395                   UseEditorAlternateList();
00396             BuildItemPoolList();
00397             SetEditorSmoothingMode( gMapInformation.ubEditorSmoothingType );
00398             AddLockedDoorCursors();
00399 
00400             for( i = 0; i < MAX_LIGHT_SPRITES; i++ )
00401             {
00402                   if( LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & LIGHT_SPR_ACTIVE && !(LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & (LIGHT_SPR_ON|MERC_LIGHT) ) )
00403                   {
00404                         LightSpritePower( i, TRUE );
00405                   }
00406             }
00407 
00408             if( gfShowPits )
00409             {
00410                   AddAllPits();
00411             }
00412 
00413             LightSetBaseLevel( (UINT8)(EDITOR_LIGHT_MAX - gusLightLevel) );
00414             ShowLightPositionHandles();
00415             LightSpriteRenderAll();
00416       }
00417       else
00418       {
00419             OutputDebugString( "Creating summary window...\n" );
00420             CreateSummaryWindow();
00421             gfNeedToInitGame = TRUE;
00422       }
00423 
00424       SetMercTeamVisibility( ENEMY_TEAM, gfShowEnemies );
00425       SetMercTeamVisibility( CREATURE_TEAM, gfShowCreatures );
00426       SetMercTeamVisibility( MILITIA_TEAM, gfShowRebels );
00427       SetMercTeamVisibility( CIV_TEAM, gfShowCivilians );
00428 
00429       // remove mouse region for pause of game
00430       RemoveMouseRegionForPauseOfClock( );
00431 
00432       gfIntendOnEnteringEditor = FALSE;
00433 
00434       OutputDebugString( "Finished entering editor mode...\n" );
00435 
00436       return(TRUE);
00437 }
00438

00440 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00441 //    EditModeShutdown
00442 //
00443 //    The above function's counterpart. Called when exiting the editor back to the game.
00444 BOOLEAN EditModeShutdown( void )
00445 {
00446       if( gfConfirmExitFirst )
00447       {
00448             gfConfirmExitPending = TRUE;
00449             CreateMessageBox( L"Exit editor?" );
00450             return FALSE;
00451       }
00452 
00453       gfEditMode = FALSE;
00454       fEditModeFirstTime = TRUE;
00455 
00456       UpdateLastActionBeforeLeaving();
00457       
00458       DeleteEditorTaskbar();
00459 
00460       // create clock mouse region for clock pause
00461       CreateMouseRegionForPauseOfClock( CLOCK_REGION_START_X, CLOCK_REGION_START_Y );
00462 
00463       iOldTaskMode = iCurrentTaskbar;
00464       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags = guiSaveTacticalStatusFlags;
00465       
00466       RemoveLightPositionHandles( );
00467       
00468       MapOptimize();
00469       
00470       RemoveCursors();
00471       
00472       fHelpScreen = FALSE;
00473       // Set render back to normal mode
00474       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= ~(NOHIDE_REDUNDENCY | SHOW_ALL_ITEMS);
00475       UpdateRoofsView( );
00476       UpdateWallsView( );
00477       // Invalidate all redundency checks
00478       InvalidateWorldRedundency();
00479 
00480 
00481       // If false lighting is on in the editor, turn it off!
00482       if ( gfFakeLights )
00483       {
00484             gusLightLevel = gusSavedLightLevel;
00485       }
00486 
00487       LightSpriteRenderAll();
00488 
00489       if( gfWorldLoaded )
00490       {
00491             ClearRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_SAVEOFF );
00492             MarkWorldDirty();
00493             RenderWorld( );
00494       }
00495 
00496       InvalidateScreen( );
00497       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
00498       EndFrameBufferRender( );
00499 
00500       MSYS_EnableRegion(&gRadarRegion);
00501       CreateCurrentTacticalPanelButtons( );
00502 
00503       // Make sure to turn off demo mode!
00504       gTacticalStatus.uiTimeOfLastInput = GetJA2Clock();
00505       gTacticalStatus.uiTimeSinceDemoOn = GetJA2Clock();
00506       gTacticalStatus.fGoingToEnterDemo = FALSE;
00507 
00508       // RETURN TO PREVIOUS SCROLL MODE
00509       gfDoVideoScroll = gfOldDoVideoScroll;
00510       gubCurScrollSpeedID = gubOldCurScrollSpeedID;
00511 
00512 
00513       DisableUndo();
00514 
00515       SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
00516 
00517 
00518       if( gfWorldLoaded )
00519       {
00520             CompileWorldMovementCosts();
00521             RaiseWorldLand();
00522             CompileInteractiveTiles();
00523             HideEntryPoints();
00524             KillItemPoolList();
00525             PrepareSchedulesForEditorExit();
00526             RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( gsSelectedMercGridNo, CONFIRMMOVE, CONFIRMMOVE );
00527             RemoveLockedDoorCursors();
00528             if( gfShowPits )
00529             {
00530                   RemoveAllPits();
00531             }
00532       }
00533 
00534       EnableButtonHelpTextRestore();
00535       
00536       if( gfNeedToInitGame )
00537       {
00538             InitStrategicLayer();
00539             WarpGameTime( 1 , WARPTIME_PROCESS_EVENTS_NORMALLY ); //to avoid helicopter setup
00540             gfNeedToInitGame = FALSE;
00541       }
00542       else
00543       {
00544             if( !gfBasement && !gfCaves )
00545                   LightSetBaseLevel( (UINT8)gusGameLightLevel );
00546             UpdateMercsInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00547       }
00548 
00549       gGameOptions.fGunNut = gfRealGunNut;
00550 
00551       DeleteBuildingLayout();
00552 
00553       HideExitGrids();
00554 
00555       UnPauseGame();
00556 
00557       return TRUE;
00558 }
00559 
00560 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00561 //    SetBackgroundTexture
00562 //
00563 //    Forces all land on the map to have the same ground texture.
00564 //
00565 void SetBackgroundTexture( )
00566 {
00567       int                                 cnt;
00568       UINT16                        usIndex, Dummy;
00569 
00570       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
00571       {
00572             // Erase old layers
00573             RemoveAllLandsOfTypeRange( cnt, FIRSTTEXTURE, DEEPWATERTEXTURE );
00574       
00575             // Add level
00576             usIndex = (UINT16)(rand( ) % 10 );
00577 
00578             // Adjust for type
00579             usIndex += gTileTypeStartIndex[ gCurrentBackground ];
00580 
00581             // Set land index
00582             if( TypeRangeExistsInLandLayer( cnt, FIRSTFLOOR, LASTFLOOR, &Dummy ) )
00583                   AddLandToTail( cnt, usIndex ); //show the land below the floor.
00584             else
00585                   AddLandToHead( cnt, usIndex ); //no floor so no worries.
00586       }     
00587 }

00590 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00591 //    DoWindowSelection
00592 //
00593 //    Displays the selection window and handles it's exit condition. Used by WaitForSelectionWindow
00594 //
00595 BOOLEAN DoWindowSelection( void )
00596 {
00597       RenderSelectionWindow( );
00598       RenderButtonsFastHelp( );
00599       if ( fAllDone )
00600       {
00601             switch ( iDrawMode )
00602             {
00603                   case DRAW_MODE_WALLS:
00604                   case DRAW_MODE_DOORS:
00605                   case DRAW_MODE_WINDOWS:
00606                   case DRAW_MODE_ROOFS:
00607                   case DRAW_MODE_BROKEN_WALLS:
00608                   case DRAW_MODE_DECOR:
00609                   case DRAW_MODE_DECALS:
00610                   case DRAW_MODE_FLOORS:
00611                   case DRAW_MODE_TOILET:
00612                   case DRAW_MODE_ROOM:
00613                   case DRAW_MODE_NEWROOF:
00614                   case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS:
00615                   case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS1:
00616                   case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS2:
00617                   case DRAW_MODE_DEBRIS:
00618                   case DRAW_MODE_BANKS:
00619                   case DRAW_MODE_ROADS:
00620                         break;
00621                   default:
00622                         iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_NOTHING;
00623                         break;
00624             }
00625             RemoveJA2SelectionWindow( );
00626             return ( TRUE );
00627       }
00628       return ( FALSE );
00629 }

00632 //Whenever the mouse attaches an object to the cursor, it has to be removed, so it doesn't stay
00633 //in the world.
00634 void RemoveTempMouseCursorObject( void )
00635 {
00636       if ( iCurBankMapIndex < 0x8000 )
00637       {
00638             ForceRemoveStructFromTail( iCurBankMapIndex );
00639             gCursorNode = NULL;
00640       }
00641 
00642 }
00643 
00644 //Whenever the editor wishes to show an object in the world, it will temporarily attach it to
00645 //the mouse cursor, to indicate what is about to be drawn.
00646 BOOLEAN DrawTempMouseCursorObject(void)
00647 {
00648       INT16       sMouseX_M, sMouseY_M;
00649       UINT16      usUseIndex;
00650       UINT16      usUseObjIndex;
00651 
00652       switch ( iDrawMode )
00653       {
00654             case DRAW_MODE_ROOM:
00655                   pSelList = SelRoom;
00656                   pNumSelList = &iNumRoomsSelected;
00657                   return FALSE;  //a special case where we just want to get the info and not display a cursor.
00658             case DRAW_MODE_NEWROOF:
00659                   pSelList = SelSingleNewRoof;
00660                   pNumSelList = &iNumNewRoofsSelected;
00661                   break;
00662             case DRAW_MODE_WALLS:
00663                   pSelList = SelSingleWall;
00664                   pNumSelList = &iNumWallsSelected;
00665                   break;
00666             case DRAW_MODE_DOORS:
00667                   pSelList = SelSingleDoor;
00668                   pNumSelList = &iNumDoorsSelected;
00669                   break;
00670             case DRAW_MODE_WINDOWS:
00671                   pSelList = SelSingleWindow;
00672                   pNumSelList = &iNumWindowsSelected;
00673                   break;
00674             case DRAW_MODE_ROOFS:
00675                   pSelList = SelSingleRoof;
00676                   pNumSelList = &iNumRoofsSelected;
00677                   break;
00678             case DRAW_MODE_BROKEN_WALLS:
00679                   pSelList = SelSingleBrokenWall;
00680                   pNumSelList = &iNumBrokenWallsSelected;
00681                   break;
00682             case DRAW_MODE_DECOR:
00683                   pSelList = SelSingleDecor;
00684                   pNumSelList = &iNumDecorSelected;
00685                   break;
00686             case DRAW_MODE_DECALS:
00687                   pSelList = SelSingleDecal;
00688                   pNumSelList = &iNumDecalsSelected;
00689                   break;
00690             case DRAW_MODE_FLOORS:
00691                   pSelList = SelSingleFloor;
00692                   pNumSelList = &iNumFloorsSelected;
00693                   break;
00694             case DRAW_MODE_TOILET:
00695                   pSelList = SelSingleToilet;
00696                   pNumSelList = &iNumToiletsSelected;
00697                   break;
00698             case DRAW_MODE_BANKS:
00699                   pSelList = SelBanks;
00700                   pNumSelList = &iNumBanksSelected;
00701                   break;
00702             case DRAW_MODE_ROADS:
00703                   pSelList = SelRoads;
00704                   pNumSelList = &iNumRoadsSelected;
00705                   break;
00706             case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS:
00707                   pSelList = SelOStructs;
00708                   pNumSelList = &iNumOStructsSelected;
00709                   break;
00710             case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS1:
00711                   pSelList = SelOStructs1;
00712                   pNumSelList = &iNumOStructs1Selected;
00713                   break;
00714             case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS2:
00715                   pSelList = SelOStructs2;
00716                   pNumSelList = &iNumOStructs2Selected;
00717                   break;
00718             case DRAW_MODE_DEBRIS:
00719                   pSelList = SelDebris;
00720                   pNumSelList = &iNumDebrisSelected;
00721                   break;
00722       }
00723 
00724       if ( GetMouseXY( &sMouseX_M, &sMouseY_M ) )
00725       {
00726             if ( (iCurBankMapIndex = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sMouseY_M, sMouseX_M )) < 0x8000 )
00727             {
00728 
00729                   //Hook into the smart methods to override the selection window methods.
00730                   if( iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_SMART_WALLS )
00731                   {
00732                         if( !CalcWallInfoUsingSmartMethod( iCurBankMapIndex, &usUseObjIndex, &usUseIndex ) )
00733                         {
00734                               return FALSE;
00735                         }
00736                   }
00737                   else if( iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_SMART_DOORS )
00738                   {
00739                         if( !CalcDoorInfoUsingSmartMethod( iCurBankMapIndex, &usUseObjIndex, &usUseIndex ) )
00740                         {
00741                               return FALSE;
00742                         }
00743                   }
00744                   else if( iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_SMART_WINDOWS )
00745                   {
00746                         if( !CalcWindowInfoUsingSmartMethod( iCurBankMapIndex, &usUseObjIndex, &usUseIndex ) )
00747                         {
00748                               return FALSE;
00749                         }
00750                   }
00751                   else if( iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_SMART_BROKEN_WALLS )
00752                   {
00753                         if( !CalcBrokenWallInfoUsingSmartMethod( iCurBankMapIndex, &usUseObjIndex, &usUseIndex ) )
00754                         {
00755                               return FALSE;
00756                         }
00757                         if( usUseObjIndex == 0xffff ||  usUseIndex == 0xffff )
00758                         {
00759                               return FALSE;
00760                         }
00761                   }
00762                   else
00763                   {
00764                         usUseIndex = pSelList[ iCurBank ].usIndex;
00765                         usUseObjIndex = (UINT16)pSelList[ iCurBank ].uiObject;
00766                   }
00767                   gCursorNode = ForceStructToTail( iCurBankMapIndex, (UINT16)(gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex) );
00768                   // ATE: Set this levelnode as dynamic!
00769                   gCursorNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC;
00770                   return( TRUE );
00771             }
00772             else
00773                   return( FALSE );
00774       }
00775 
00776       return( FALSE );
00777 }
00778                   
00779 
00780 //Displays the current drawing object in the small, lower left window of the editor's toolbar.
00781 void ShowCurrentDrawingMode( void )
00782 {
00783       SGPRect                 ClipRect, NewRect;
00784       INT32                   iShowMode;
00785       UINT16                  usUseIndex;
00786       UINT16                  usObjIndex;
00787       INT32                   iStartX = 50;
00788       INT32                   iStartY = 440;
00789       INT32                   iPicHeight, iPicWidth;
00790       INT16                   sTempOffsetX;
00791       INT16                   sTempOffsetY;
00792       ETRLEObject *pETRLEObject;
00793       UINT32                  uiDestPitchBYTES;
00794       UINT8                   *pDestBuf;
00795       UINT16                  usFillColor;
00796       INT32                   iIndexToUse;
00797       
00798       // Set up a clipping rectangle for the display window.
00799       NewRect.iLeft = 0;
00800       NewRect.iTop = 400;
00801       NewRect.iRight = 100;
00802       NewRect.iBottom = 458;
00803 
00804       GetClippingRect(&ClipRect);
00805       SetClippingRect(&NewRect);
00806 
00807       // Clear it out
00808       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 400, 100, 458, 0 );
00809 
00810       iShowMode = iDrawMode;
00811       if ( iDrawMode >= DRAW_MODE_ERASE )
00812             iShowMode -= DRAW_MODE_ERASE;
00813 
00814       usUseIndex = usObjIndex = 0xffff;
00815 
00816       iIndexToUse = 0;
00817       if ( fDontUseRandom )
00818             iIndexToUse = iCurBank;
00819 
00820       // Select object to be displayed depending on the current editing mode.
00821       switch ( iShowMode )
00822       {
00823             case DRAW_MODE_ROOM:
00824             case DRAW_MODE_SLANTED_ROOF:
00825                   if ( iNumWallsSelected > 0 )
00826                   {
00827                         usUseIndex = SelRoom[0].usIndex;
00828                         usObjIndex = (UINT16)SelRoom[0].uiObject;
00829                   }
00830                   break;
00831 
00832             case DRAW_MODE_GROUND:
00833             case (DRAW_MODE_GROUND + DRAW_MODE_FILL_AREA):
00834                   usUseIndex = 0;
00835                   usObjIndex = CurrentPaste;
00836                   break;
00837 
00838             case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS:
00839                   if ( iNumOStructsSelected > 0 )
00840                   {
00841                         usUseIndex = SelOStructs[ iIndexToUse ].usIndex;
00842                         usObjIndex = (UINT16)SelOStructs[ iIndexToUse ].uiObject;
00843                   }
00844                   break;
00845             
00846             case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS1:
00847                   if ( iNumOStructs1Selected > 0 )
00848                   {
00849                         usUseIndex = SelOStructs1[ iIndexToUse ].usIndex;
00850                         usObjIndex = (UINT16)SelOStructs1[ iIndexToUse ].uiObject;
00851                   }
00852                   break;
00853 
00854             case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS2:
00855                   if ( iNumOStructs2Selected > 0 )
00856                   {
00857                         usUseIndex = SelOStructs2[ iIndexToUse ].usIndex;
00858                         usObjIndex = (UINT16)SelOStructs2[ iIndexToUse ].uiObject;
00859                   }
00860                   break;
00861 
00862             case DRAW_MODE_DEBRIS:
00863                   if ( iNumDebrisSelected > 0 )
00864                   {
00865                         usUseIndex = SelDebris[ iIndexToUse ].usIndex;
00866                         usObjIndex = (UINT16)SelDebris[ iIndexToUse ].uiObject;
00867                   }
00868                   break;
00869 
00870             case DRAW_MODE_BANKS:
00871                   if ( iNumBanksSelected > 0 )
00872                   {
00873                         usUseIndex = SelBanks[ iCurBank ].usIndex;
00874                         usObjIndex = (UINT16)SelBanks[ iCurBank ].uiObject;
00875                   }
00876                   break;
00877 
00878             case DRAW_MODE_ROADS:
00879                   if ( iNumRoadsSelected > 0 )
00880                   {
00881                         usUseIndex = SelRoads[ iCurBank ].usIndex;
00882                         usObjIndex = (UINT16)SelRoads[ iCurBank ].uiObject;
00883                   }
00884                   break;
00885 
00886             case DRAW_MODE_WALLS:
00887                   if ( iNumWallsSelected > 0 )
00888                   {
00889                         usUseIndex = SelSingleWall[ iCurBank ].usIndex;
00890                         usObjIndex = (UINT16)SelSingleWall[ iCurBank ].uiObject;
00891                   }
00892                   break;
00893             case DRAW_MODE_DOORS:
00894                   if ( iNumDoorsSelected > 0 )
00895                   {
00896                         usUseIndex = SelSingleDoor[ iCurBank ].usIndex;
00897                         usObjIndex = (UINT16)SelSingleDoor[ iCurBank ].uiObject;
00898                   }
00899                   break;
00900             case DRAW_MODE_WINDOWS:
00901                   if( iNumWindowsSelected > 0 )
00902                   {
00903                         usUseIndex = SelSingleWindow[ iCurBank ].usIndex;
00904                         usObjIndex = (UINT16)SelSingleWindow[ iCurBank ].uiObject;
00905                   }     
00906                   break;
00907             case DRAW_MODE_ROOFS:
00908                   if ( iNumRoofsSelected > 0 )
00909                   {
00910                         usUseIndex = SelSingleRoof[ iCurBank ].usIndex;
00911                         usObjIndex = (UINT16)SelSingleRoof[ iCurBank ].uiObject;
00912                   }
00913                   break;
00914             case DRAW_MODE_NEWROOF:
00915                   if( iNumNewRoofsSelected > 0 )
00916                   {
00917                         usUseIndex = SelSingleNewRoof[ iCurBank ].usIndex;
00918                         usObjIndex = (UINT16)SelSingleNewRoof[ iCurBank ].uiObject;
00919                   }
00920                   break;
00921             case DRAW_MODE_BROKEN_WALLS:
00922                   if ( iNumBrokenWallsSelected > 0 )
00923                   {
00924                         usUseIndex = SelSingleBrokenWall[ iCurBank ].usIndex;
00925                         usObjIndex = (UINT16)SelSingleBrokenWall[ iCurBank ].uiObject;
00926                   }
00927                   break;
00928             case DRAW_MODE_DECOR:
00929                   if ( iNumDecorSelected > 0 )
00930                   {
00931                         usUseIndex = SelSingleDecor[ iCurBank ].usIndex;
00932                         usObjIndex = (UINT16)SelSingleDecor[ iCurBank ].uiObject;
00933                   }
00934                   break;
00935             case DRAW_MODE_DECALS:
00936                   if ( iNumDecalsSelected > 0 )
00937                   {
00938                         usUseIndex = SelSingleDecal[ iCurBank ].usIndex;
00939                         usObjIndex = (UINT16)SelSingleDecal[ iCurBank ].uiObject;
00940                   }
00941                   break;
00942             case DRAW_MODE_FLOORS:
00943                   if ( iNumFloorsSelected > 0 )
00944                   {
00945                         usUseIndex = SelSingleFloor[ iCurBank ].usIndex;
00946                         usObjIndex = (UINT16)SelSingleFloor[ iCurBank ].uiObject;
00947                   }
00948                   break;
00949             case DRAW_MODE_TOILET:
00950                   if( iNumToiletsSelected > 0 )
00951                   {
00952                         usUseIndex = SelSingleToilet[ iCurBank ].usIndex;
00953                         usObjIndex = (UINT16)SelSingleToilet[ iCurBank ].uiObject;
00954                   }
00955                   break;
00956             case DRAW_MODE_SMART_WALLS:
00957                   if ( GetMouseXY( &sGridX, &sGridY ) )
00958                   {
00959                         iMapIndex = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );
00960                         if( CalcWallInfoUsingSmartMethod( iMapIndex, &usObjIndex, &usUseIndex ) )
00961                               break;
00962                   }
00963                   CalcSmartWallDefault( &usObjIndex, &usUseIndex );
00964                   break;
00965             case DRAW_MODE_SMART_DOORS:
00966                   if ( GetMouseXY( &sGridX, &sGridY ) )
00967                   {
00968                         iMapIndex = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );
00969                         if( CalcDoorInfoUsingSmartMethod( iMapIndex, &usObjIndex, &usUseIndex ) )
00970                               break;
00971                   }
00972                   CalcSmartDoorDefault( &usObjIndex, &usUseIndex );
00973                   break;
00974             case DRAW_MODE_SMART_WINDOWS:
00975                   if ( GetMouseXY( &sGridX, &sGridY ) )
00976                   {
00977                         iMapIndex = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );
00978                         if( CalcWindowInfoUsingSmartMethod( iMapIndex, &usObjIndex, &usUseIndex ) )
00979                               break;
00980                   }
00981                   CalcSmartWindowDefault( &usObjIndex, &usUseIndex );
00982                   break;
00983             case DRAW_MODE_SMART_BROKEN_WALLS:
00984                   if ( GetMouseXY( &sGridX, &sGridY ) )
00985                   {
00986                         iMapIndex = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );
00987                         if( CalcBrokenWallInfoUsingSmartMethod( iMapIndex, &usObjIndex, &usUseIndex ) )
00988                               break;
00989                   }
00990                   CalcSmartBrokenWallDefault( &usObjIndex, &usUseIndex );
00991                   break;
00992 
00993             case DRAW_MODE_PLACE_ITEM:
00994                   DisplayItemStatistics();
00995                   break;
00996       }
00997  
00998       // If we actually have something to draw, draw it
00999       if ( (usUseIndex != 0xffff) && (usObjIndex != 0xffff) )
01000       {
01001             pETRLEObject = &(gTileDatabase[gTileTypeStartIndex[usObjIndex]].hTileSurface->pETRLEObject[usUseIndex]);
01002 
01003             iPicWidth = (INT32)pETRLEObject->usWidth;
01004             iPicHeight = (INT32)pETRLEObject->usHeight;
01005 
01006             // Center the picture in the display window.
01007             iStartX = ( 100 - iPicWidth ) / 2;
01008             iStartY = ( 60 - iPicHeight ) / 2;
01009 
01010             // We have to store the offset data in temp variables before zeroing them and blitting
01011             sTempOffsetX = pETRLEObject->sOffsetX;
01012             sTempOffsetY = pETRLEObject->sOffsetY;
01013 
01014             // Set the offsets used for blitting to 0
01015             pETRLEObject->sOffsetX = 0;
01016             pETRLEObject->sOffsetY = 0;
01017 
01018             SetObjectShade( gTileDatabase[gTileTypeStartIndex[usObjIndex]].hTileSurface, DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL );
01019             BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, gTileDatabase[gTileTypeStartIndex[usObjIndex]].hTileSurface, 
01020                                                        usUseIndex, (0 + iStartX), (400 + iStartY), 
01021                                                        VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL);
01022 
01023             pETRLEObject->sOffsetX = sTempOffsetX;
01024             pETRLEObject->sOffsetY = sTempOffsetY;
01025       }
01026 
01027       // Set the color for the window's border. Blueish color = Normal, Red = Fake lighting is turned on
01028       usFillColor = GenericButtonFillColors[0];
01029       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
01030       if(gbPixelDepth==16)
01031             RectangleDraw( FALSE, 0, 400, 99, 458, usFillColor, pDestBuf );
01032       else if(gbPixelDepth==8)
01033             RectangleDraw8( FALSE, 0, 400, 99, 458, usFillColor, pDestBuf );
01034 
01035       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01036 
01037       InvalidateRegion( 0, 400, 100, 458 );
01038       SetClippingRect(&ClipRect);
01039 }
01040
