01042 
01043 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01044 //    HandleJA2ToolbarSelection
01045 //
01046 //    Select action to be taken based on user's toolbar selection.
01047 //
01048 void HandleJA2ToolbarSelection( void )
01049 {
01050       BOOLEAN fPrevState;
01051 
01052       fPrevState = gfRenderTaskbar;
01053       gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
01054 
01055       switch (iEditorToolbarState)
01056       {
01057 
01058             case TBAR_MODE_SET_BGRND:
01059                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_SET_NEW_BACKGROUND;
01060                   break;
01061       
01062             case TBAR_MODE_DENS_DWN:
01063                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_DENSITY_DOWN;
01064                   break;
01065 
01066             case TBAR_MODE_DENS_UP:
01067                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_DENSITY_UP;
01068                   break;
01069 
01070             case TBAR_MODE_RAISE_LAND:
01071                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_RAISE_LAND;
01072                   break;
01073 
01074             case TBAR_MODE_LOWER_LAND:
01075                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_LOWER_LAND;
01076                   break;
01077 
01078             case TBAR_MODE_DEC_DIFF:
01079                   if ( sCurBaseDiff > 0 )
01080                         sCurBaseDiff--;
01081                   break;
01082 
01083             case TBAR_MODE_INC_DIFF:
01084                   if ( sCurBaseDiff < 4 )
01085                         sCurBaseDiff++;
01086                   break;
01087 
01088             case TBAR_MODE_FAKE_LIGHTING:
01089                   gfFakeLights ^= TRUE;
01090                   if ( gfFakeLights )
01091                   {
01092                         gusSavedLightLevel = gusLightLevel;
01093                         gusLightLevel = EDITOR_LIGHT_FAKE;
01094                   }
01095                   else
01096                         gusLightLevel = gusSavedLightLevel;
01097                   LightSetBaseLevel( (UINT8)(EDITOR_LIGHT_MAX - gusLightLevel) );
01098                   LightSpriteRenderAll();
01099                   break;
01100 
01101             case TBAR_MODE_CHANGE_TILESET:
01102                   InitPopupMenu( iEditorButton[OPTIONS_CHANGE_TILESET], CHANGETSET_POPUP, DIR_UPRIGHT );
01103                   break;
01104 
01105             case TBAR_MODE_CIVILIAN_GROUP:
01106                   InitPopupMenu( iEditorButton[MERCS_CIVILIAN_GROUP], CHANGECIVGROUP_POPUP, DIR_UPLEFT );
01107                   break;
01108 
01109             case TBAR_MODE_GET_WALL:
01110                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_GET_WALL;
01111                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_WALLS;
01112                   break;
01113             case TBAR_MODE_GET_DOOR:
01114                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_GET_DOOR;
01115                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_DOORS;
01116                   break;
01117             case TBAR_MODE_GET_WINDOW:
01118                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_GET_WINDOW;
01119                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_WINDOWS;
01120                   break;
01121             case TBAR_MODE_GET_ROOF:
01122                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_GET_ROOF;
01123                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_ROOFS;
01124                   break;
01125             case TBAR_MODE_GET_BROKEN_WALL:
01126                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_GET_BROKEN_WALL;
01127                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_BROKEN_WALLS;
01128                   break;
01129             case TBAR_MODE_GET_DECOR:
01130                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_GET_DECOR;
01131                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_DECOR;
01132                   break;
01133             case TBAR_MODE_GET_DECAL:
01134                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_GET_DECAL;
01135                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_DECALS;
01136                   break;
01137             case TBAR_MODE_GET_FLOOR:
01138                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_GET_FLOOR;
01139                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_FLOORS;
01140                   break;
01141             case TBAR_MODE_GET_TOILET:
01142                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_GET_TOILET;
01143                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_TOILET;
01144                   break;
01145             case TBAR_MODE_GET_ROOM:
01146                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_GET_ROOM;
01147                   break;
01148             case TBAR_MODE_GET_NEW_ROOF:
01149                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_GET_NEW_ROOF;
01150                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_NEWROOF;
01151                   break;
01152 
01153             case TBAR_MODE_FILL_AREA:
01154                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_GROUND + DRAW_MODE_FILL_AREA;
01155                   ClickEditorButton( TERRAIN_FGROUND_TEXTURES );
01156                   TerrainTileDrawMode = TERRAIN_TILES_FOREGROUND;
01157                   break;
01158 
01159             case TBAR_MODE_FILL_AREA_OFF:
01160                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_GROUND;
01161                   ClickEditorButton( TERRAIN_FGROUND_TEXTURES );
01162                   TerrainTileDrawMode = TERRAIN_TILES_FOREGROUND;
01163                   break;
01164 
01165             case TBAR_MODE_GET_BANKS:
01166                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_NEXT_BANK;
01167                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_BANKS;
01168                   break;
01169 
01170             case TBAR_MODE_GET_ROADS:
01171                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_NEXT_ROAD;
01172                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_ROADS;
01173                   break;
01174 
01175             case TBAR_MODE_DRAW_BANKS:
01176                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_NULL;
01177                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_BANKS;
01178                   break;
01179             
01180             case TBAR_MODE_GET_DEBRIS:
01181                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_NEXT_DEBRIS;
01182                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_DEBRIS;
01183                   break;
01184 
01185             case TBAR_MODE_DRAW_DEBRIS:
01186                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_NULL;
01187                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_DEBRIS;
01188                   break;
01189             
01190             case TBAR_MODE_GET_OSTRUCTS:
01191                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_NEXT_STRUCT;
01192                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS;
01193                   break;
01194 
01195             case TBAR_MODE_DRAW_OSTRUCTS:
01196                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_NULL;
01197                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS;
01198                   break;
01199 
01200             case TBAR_MODE_GET_OSTRUCTS1:
01201                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_NEXT_STRUCT1;
01202                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS1;
01203                   break;
01204 
01205             case TBAR_MODE_DRAW_OSTRUCTS1:
01206                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_NULL;
01207                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS1;
01208                   break;
01209             
01210             case TBAR_MODE_GET_OSTRUCTS2:
01211                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_NEXT_STRUCT2;
01212                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS2;
01213                   break;
01214 
01215             case TBAR_MODE_DRAW_OSTRUCTS2:
01216                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_NULL;
01217                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS2;
01218                   break;
01219 
01220             case TBAR_MODE_EXIT_EDIT:
01221                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_EXIT_EDITOR;
01222                   break;
01223 
01224             case TBAR_MODE_QUIT_GAME:
01225                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_QUIT_GAME;
01226                   break;
01227 
01228             case TBAR_MODE_SAVE:
01229                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_SAVE_MAP;
01230                   break;
01231 
01232             case TBAR_MODE_LOAD:
01233                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_LOAD_MAP;
01234                   break;
01235 
01236             case TBAR_MODE_UNDO:
01237                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_UNDO;
01238                   break;
01239 
01240             case TBAR_MODE_CHANGE_BRUSH:
01241                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_NEXT_SELECTIONTYPE;
01242                   break;
01243             
01244             case TBAR_MODE_ERASE:
01245                   switch ( iDrawMode )
01246                   {
01247                         case DRAW_MODE_EXITGRID:
01248                         case DRAW_MODE_LIGHT:
01249                         case DRAW_MODE_GROUND:
01250                         case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS:
01251                         case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS1:
01252                         case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS2:
01253                         case DRAW_MODE_DEBRIS:
01254                         case DRAW_MODE_BANKS:
01255                         case DRAW_MODE_ROADS:
01256 
01257                         case DRAW_MODE_WALLS:
01258                         case DRAW_MODE_DOORS:
01259                         case DRAW_MODE_WINDOWS:
01260                         case DRAW_MODE_ROOFS:
01261                         case DRAW_MODE_BROKEN_WALLS:
01262                         case DRAW_MODE_DECALS:
01263                         case DRAW_MODE_DECOR:
01264                         case DRAW_MODE_FLOORS:
01265                         case DRAW_MODE_TOILET:
01266 
01267                         case DRAW_MODE_ROOM:
01268                         case DRAW_MODE_SLANTED_ROOF:
01269                         case DRAW_MODE_ROOMNUM:
01270                               iDrawMode += DRAW_MODE_ERASE;
01271                               break;
01272                   }
01273                   break;
01274 
01275             case TBAR_MODE_ERASE_OFF:
01276                   if ( iDrawMode >= DRAW_MODE_ERASE )
01277                         iDrawMode -= DRAW_MODE_ERASE;
01278                   break;
01279 
01280             case TBAR_MODE_NEW_MAP:
01281                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_NEW_MAP;
01282                   break;
01283 
01284             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_WEAPONS:
01285             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_AMMO:
01286             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_ARMOUR:
01287             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EXPLOSIVES:
01288             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EQUIPMENT1:
01289             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EQUIPMENT2:
01290             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EQUIPMENT3:
01291             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_TRIGGERS:
01292             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_KEYS:
01293                   //Set up the items by type.
01294                   InitEditorItemsInfo(iEditorToolbarState);
01295                   if( gubCurrMercMode != MERC_GETITEMMODE )
01296                         iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_PLACE_ITEM;
01297                   break;
01298             case TBAR_MODE_NONE:
01299                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_NULL;
01300                   gfRenderTaskbar = fPrevState;
01301                   break;
01302             default:
01303                   iCurrentAction = ACTION_NULL;
01304                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_NOTHING;
01305                   gfRenderTaskbar = fPrevState;
01306                   break;
01307       }
01308       iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_NONE;
01309 }
01310 
01311 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01312 //    HandleKeyboardShortcuts
01313 //
01314 //    Select action to be taken based on the user's current key press (if any)
01315 //
01316 
01317 extern INT8 gbCurrSelect;
01318 extern void DeleteSelectedMercsItem();
01319 void HandleKeyboardShortcuts( )
01320 {
01321       static INT32 iSavedMode;
01322   static BOOLEAN fShowTrees = TRUE;
01323       while( DequeueEvent( &EditorInputEvent ) )
01324       {
01325             if( !HandleSummaryInput( &EditorInputEvent ) && !HandleTextInput( &EditorInputEvent ) && EditorInputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )
01326             {
01327                   if( gfGotoGridNoUI )
01328                   {
01329                         switch( EditorInputEvent.usParam )
01330                         {
01331                               case ESC:
01332                                     SetInputFieldStringWith16BitString( 0, L"" );
01333                                     RemoveGotoGridNoUI();
01334                                     break;
01335                               case ENTER:
01336                                     RemoveGotoGridNoUI();
01337                                     break;
01338                               case 'x':
01339                                     if( EditorInputEvent.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN )
01340                                     {
01341                                           SetInputFieldStringWith16BitString( 0, L"" );
01342                                           RemoveGotoGridNoUI();
01343                                           iCurrentAction = ACTION_QUIT_GAME;
01344                                     }
01345                                     break;
01346                         }
01347                   }
01348                   else switch( EditorInputEvent.usParam )
01349                   {
01350                         case HOME:
01351                               gfFakeLights ^= TRUE;
01352                               if ( gfFakeLights )
01353                               {
01354                                     gusSavedLightLevel = gusLightLevel;
01355                                     gusLightLevel = EDITOR_LIGHT_FAKE;
01356                                     ClickEditorButton( MAPINFO_TOGGLE_FAKE_LIGHTS );
01357                               }
01358                               else
01359                               {
01360                                     gusLightLevel = gusSavedLightLevel;
01361                                     UnclickEditorButton( MAPINFO_TOGGLE_FAKE_LIGHTS );
01362                               }
01363                               LightSetBaseLevel( (UINT8)(EDITOR_LIGHT_MAX - gusLightLevel) );
01364                               LightSpriteRenderAll();
01365                               break;
01366 
01367                         case SPACE:
01368                               if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_MERCS )
01369                                     IndicateSelectedMerc( SELECT_NEXT_MERC );
01370                               else if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_ITEMS )
01371                                     SelectNextItemPool();
01372                               else if( gfShowTerrainTileButtons && fUseTerrainWeights )
01373                                     ResetTerrainTileWeights();
01374                               else
01375                                     LightSpriteRenderAll();
01376                               break;
01377 
01378                         case INSERT:
01379                               if ( iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_GROUND )
01380                               {
01381                                     iDrawMode += DRAW_MODE_FILL_AREA;
01382                                     ClickEditorButton( TERRAIN_FILL_AREA );
01383                                     iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_FILL_AREA;
01384                               }
01385                               else if ( iDrawMode == (DRAW_MODE_GROUND + DRAW_MODE_FILL_AREA) )
01386                               {
01387                                     iDrawMode -= DRAW_MODE_FILL_AREA;
01388                                     UnclickEditorButton( TERRAIN_FILL_AREA );
01389                                     iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_FILL_AREA_OFF;
01390                               }
01391                               break;
01392                         case ENTER:
01393                               if( gfEditingDoor )
01394                               {
01395                                     ExtractAndUpdateDoorInfo();
01396                                     KillDoorEditing();
01397                               }
01398                               else if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_MERCS && gsSelectedMercID != -1 )
01399                                     ExtractCurrentMercModeInfo( FALSE );
01400                               else if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_MAPINFO )
01401                                     ExtractAndUpdateMapInfo();
01402                               else if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_BUILDINGS )
01403                                     ExtractAndUpdateBuildingInfo();
01404                               else if( gfShowItemStatsPanel && EditingText() )
01405                                     ExecuteItemStatsCmd( ITEMSTATS_APPLY );
01406                               break;
01407 
01408                         case BACKSPACE:
01409                               iCurrentAction = ACTION_UNDO;
01410                               break;
01411 
01412                         case DEL:
01413                               if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_ITEMS )
01414                                     DeleteSelectedItem();
01415                               else if( gsSelectedMercID != -1 )
01416                               {
01417                                     if( gubCurrMercMode == MERC_INVENTORYMODE && gbCurrSelect != -1 )
01418                                     {
01419                                           DeleteSelectedMercsItem();
01420                                           gbCurrSelect = -1;
01421                                           gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
01422                                     }
01423                                     else
01424                                           DeleteSelectedMerc();
01425                               }
01426                               else
01427                                     iCurrentAction = ACTION_QUICK_ERASE;
01428                               break;
01429 
01430                         case ESC:
01431                               if ( InOverheadMap() )
01432                               {
01433                                     KillOverheadMap();
01434                               }
01435                               if( iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_SCHEDULEACTION )
01436                               {
01437                                     CancelCurrentScheduleAction();
01438                               }
01439                               else if( gfMercGetItem )
01440                               { //cancel getting an item for the merc.
01441                                     gfMercGetItem = FALSE;
01442                                     gusMercsNewItemIndex = 0xffff;
01443                                     SetMercEditingMode( MERC_INVENTORYMODE );
01444                                     ClearEditorItemsInfo();
01445                               }
01446                               else if( gfShowItemStatsPanel && EditingText() )
01447                                     ExecuteItemStatsCmd( ITEMSTATS_CANCEL );
01448                               else if( gfEditingDoor )
01449                                     KillDoorEditing();
01450                               else
01451                                     iCurrentAction = ACTION_EXIT_EDITOR;
01452                               break;
01453 
01454                         //Select next/prev terrain tile to draw with.
01455                         case SHIFT_LEFTARROW:
01456                               CurrentPaste -= ( gfShowTerrainTileButtons && CurrentPaste > 0 ) ? 1 : 0;
01457                               break;
01458                         case SHIFT_RIGHTARROW:
01459                               CurrentPaste += ( gfShowTerrainTileButtons && CurrentPaste < 8 ) ? 1 : 0;
01460                               break;
01461 
01462                         case PGUP:
01463                               if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_MERCS && !fBuildingShowRoofs )
01464                               {
01465                                     gfRoofPlacement = TRUE;
01466                                     fBuildingShowRoofs = TRUE;
01467                                     UpdateRoofsView();
01468                                     gfRenderWorld = TRUE;
01469                               }
01470                               else switch( iDrawMode )
01471                               {
01472                                     case DRAW_MODE_SMART_WALLS:                           DecSmartWallUIValue();                                                  break;
01473                                     case DRAW_MODE_SMART_DOORS:                           DecSmartDoorUIValue();                                                  break;
01474                                     case DRAW_MODE_SMART_WINDOWS:                   DecSmartWindowUIValue();                                                break;
01475                                     case DRAW_MODE_SMART_BROKEN_WALLS:  DecSmartBrokenWallUIValue();                                break;
01476                                     case DRAW_MODE_PLACE_ITEM:                            SelectPrevItemInPool();                                                 break;
01477                                     default:                                                                                  iCurrentAction = ACTION_SUB_INDEX_UP;           break;
01478                               }
01479                               gfRenderDrawingMode = TRUE;
01480                               break;
01481                         case PGDN:
01482                               if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_MERCS && fBuildingShowRoofs )
01483                               {
01484                                     gfRoofPlacement = FALSE;
01485                                     fBuildingShowRoofs = FALSE;
01486                                     UpdateRoofsView();
01487                                     gfRenderWorld = TRUE;
01488                               }
01489                               else switch( iDrawMode )
01490                               {
01491                                     case DRAW_MODE_SMART_WALLS:                           IncSmartWallUIValue();                                                  break;
01492                                     case DRAW_MODE_SMART_DOORS:                           IncSmartDoorUIValue();                                                  break;
01493                                     case DRAW_MODE_SMART_WINDOWS:                   IncSmartWindowUIValue();                                                break;
01494                                     case DRAW_MODE_SMART_BROKEN_WALLS:  IncSmartBrokenWallUIValue();                                break;
01495                                     case DRAW_MODE_PLACE_ITEM:                            SelectNextItemInPool();                                                 break;
01496                                     default:                                                                                  iCurrentAction = ACTION_SUB_INDEX_DWN;    break;
01497                               }
01498                               gfRenderDrawingMode = TRUE;
01499                               break;
01500 
01501                         case F1:
01502                               gfRenderWorld = TRUE;
01503                               gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
01504                               break;
01505       
01506                         case F2:
01507                               if (EditorInputEvent.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN )
01508                               {
01509                                     ReloadMap();
01510                               }
01511                               break;
01512 
01513                         case F3:
01514                               if( EditorInputEvent.usKeyState & CTRL_DOWN )
01515                               {
01516                                     ReplaceObsoleteRoads();
01517                                     MarkWorldDirty();
01518                               }
01519                               break;
01520 
01521                         case F4:
01522                               MusicPlay( giMusicID );
01523                               ScreenMsg( FONT_YELLOW, MSG_DEBUG, L"%S", szMusicList[giMusicID] );
01524                               giMusicID++;
01525                               if( giMusicID >= NUM_MUSIC )
01526                                     giMusicID = 0;
01527                               break;
01528 
01529                         case F5:
01530                               UpdateLastActionBeforeLeaving();
01531                               CreateSummaryWindow(); 
01532                               break;
01533 
01534                         case F6:
01535                               break;
01536 
01537                         case F7:
01538                               if( gfBasement )
01539                               {
01540                                     INT32 i;
01541                                     UINT16 usRoofIndex, usRoofType, usTileIndex;
01542                                     pSelList = SelSingleRoof;
01543                                     pNumSelList = &iNumRoofsSelected;
01544                                     usRoofType = GetRandomIndexByRange( FIRSTROOF, LASTROOF );
01545                                     if( usRoofType == 0xffff )
01546                                           usRoofType = FIRSTROOF;
01547                                     for( i = 0; i < WORLD_MAX; i++ )
01548                                     {
01549                                           if( gubWorldRoomInfo[ i ] )
01550                                           {
01551                                                 AddToUndoList( i );
01552                                                 RemoveAllRoofsOfTypeRange( i, FIRSTTEXTURE, LASTITEM );     
01553                                                 RemoveAllOnRoofsOfTypeRange( i, FIRSTTEXTURE, LASTITEM );
01554                                                 RemoveAllShadowsOfTypeRange( i, FIRSTROOF, LASTSLANTROOF );
01555                                                 usRoofIndex = 9 + ( rand() % 3 );
01556                                                 GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( usRoofType, usRoofIndex, &usTileIndex );
01557                                                 AddRoofToHead( i, usTileIndex );
01558                                           }
01559                                     }
01560                                     MarkWorldDirty();
01561                               }
01562                               break;
01563 
01564                         case F8:
01565                               SmoothAllTerrainWorld();
01566                               break;
01567 
01568                         case F9:
01569                               break;
01570                         case F10:
01571                               CreateMessageBox( L"Are you sure you wish to remove all lights?" );
01572                               gfRemoveLightsPending = TRUE;
01573                               break;
01574                         case F11:
01575                               CreateMessageBox( L"Are you sure you wish to reverse the schedules?" );
01576                               gfScheduleReversalPending = TRUE;
01577                               break;
01578                         case F12:
01579                               CreateMessageBox( L"Are you sure you wish to clear all of the schedules?" );
01580                               gfScheduleClearPending = TRUE;
01581                               break;
01582 
01583                         case '[':
01584                               iCurrentAction = ACTION_DENSITY_DOWN;
01585                               break;
01586 
01587                         case ']':
01588                               iCurrentAction = ACTION_DENSITY_UP;
01589                               break;
01590                   
01591                         case '+':
01592                               //if ( iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_SHOW_TILESET )
01593                               //    iCurrentAction = ACTION_MLIST_DWN;
01594                               //else
01595                                     iCurrentAction = ACTION_SHADE_UP;
01596                               break;
01597 
01598                         case '-':
01599                               //if ( iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_SHOW_TILESET )
01600                               //    iCurrentAction = ACTION_MLIST_UP;
01601                               iCurrentAction = ACTION_SHADE_DWN;
01602                               break;
01603 
01604                         case '0':
01605                         case '1':
01606                         case '2':
01607                         case '3':
01608                         case '4':
01609                         case '5':
01610                         case '6':
01611                         case '7':
01612                         case '8':
01613                         case '9':
01614                                     if ( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_MERCS )
01615                                     {
01616                                           if ( iDrawMode >= DRAW_MODE_ERASE )
01617                                                 iCurrentAction = ACTION_ERASE_WAYPOINT;
01618                                           else
01619                                                 iCurrentAction = ACTION_SET_WAYPOINT;
01620                                           iActionParam = EditorInputEvent.usParam - '0';
01621                                     }
01622                                     else
01623                                     {
01624                                           iCurrentAction = ACTION_SET_FNAME;
01625                                           iActionParam = EditorInputEvent.usParam - '0';
01626                                     }
01627                               break;
01628 
01629                         case 'a':
01630                               iCurrentAction = ACTION_PREV_SELECTIONTYPE;
01631                               break;
01632                         case 'b':
01633                               if ( iCurrentTaskbar != TASK_BUILDINGS )
01634                               {
01635                                     iTaskMode = TASK_BUILDINGS;
01636                                     DoTaskbar();
01637                               }
01638 
01639                               if( CheckForSlantRoofs() )
01640                                     iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_SLANTED_ROOF;
01641                               else
01642                               {
01643                                     gusSelectionType = gusSavedBuildingSelectionType;
01644                                     iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_ROOM;
01645                               }
01646                               if( gfCaves )
01647                                     SetEditorBuildingTaskbarMode( BUILDING_CAVE_DRAWING );
01648                               else
01649                                     SetEditorBuildingTaskbarMode( BUILDING_NEW_ROOM );
01650                               TerrainTileDrawMode = TERRAIN_TILES_BRETS_STRANGEMODE;
01651                               break;
01652                         case 'c':
01653                               if( EditorInputEvent.usKeyState & CTRL_DOWN && iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_MERCS )
01654                               {
01655                                     iCurrentAction = ACTION_COPY_MERC_PLACEMENT;
01656                               }
01657                               break;
01658 
01659                         case 'd': // debris
01660                               if( iCurrentTaskbar != TASK_TERRAIN )
01661                               {
01662                                     iTaskMode = TASK_TERRAIN;
01663                                     DoTaskbar();
01664                               }
01665 
01666                               iCurrentAction = ACTION_NULL;
01667                               iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_DEBRIS;
01668                               ClickEditorButton( TERRAIN_PLACE_DEBRIS );                        
01669                               iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_DRAW_DEBRIS;
01670                               TerrainTileDrawMode = TERRAIN_TILES_NODRAW;
01671                               break;
01672                         case 'e':
01673                               if ( iDrawMode >= DRAW_MODE_ERASE )
01674                               {
01675                                     iDrawMode -= DRAW_MODE_ERASE;
01676                               }
01677                               else
01678                               {
01679                                     switch ( iDrawMode )
01680                                     {
01681                                           case DRAW_MODE_NORTHPOINT:
01682                                           case DRAW_MODE_WESTPOINT:
01683                                           case DRAW_MODE_EASTPOINT:
01684                                           case DRAW_MODE_SOUTHPOINT:
01685                                           case DRAW_MODE_CENTERPOINT:
01686                                           case DRAW_MODE_ISOLATEDPOINT:
01687                                           case DRAW_MODE_EXITGRID:
01688                                           case DRAW_MODE_LIGHT:
01689                                           case DRAW_MODE_GROUND:
01690                                           case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS:
01691                                           case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS1:
01692                                           case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS2:
01693                                           case DRAW_MODE_DEBRIS:
01694                                           case DRAW_MODE_BANKS:
01695                                           case DRAW_MODE_ROADS:
01696                                           case DRAW_MODE_WALLS:
01697                                           case DRAW_MODE_DOORS:
01698                                           case DRAW_MODE_WINDOWS:
01699                                           case DRAW_MODE_ROOFS:
01700                                           case DRAW_MODE_BROKEN_WALLS:
01701                                           case DRAW_MODE_DECOR:
01702                                           case DRAW_MODE_DECALS:
01703                                           case DRAW_MODE_FLOORS:
01704                                           case DRAW_MODE_TOILET:
01705                                           case DRAW_MODE_ROOM:
01706                                           case DRAW_MODE_SLANTED_ROOF:
01707                                           case DRAW_MODE_ROOMNUM:
01708                                                 iDrawMode += DRAW_MODE_ERASE;
01709                                                 break;
01710                                     }
01711                               }
01712                               break;
01713                         case 'f':
01714                               gbFPSDisplay = !gbFPSDisplay;
01715                               DisableFPSOverlay( (BOOLEAN)!gbFPSDisplay );
01716                               break;
01717                         case 'g':   // ground
01718                               if( EditorInputEvent.usKeyState & CTRL_DOWN )
01719                               {
01720                                     CreateGotoGridNoUI();
01721                               }
01722                               else 
01723                               {
01724                                     if ( iCurrentTaskbar != TASK_TERRAIN )
01725                                     {
01726                                           iTaskMode = TASK_TERRAIN;
01727                                           DoTaskbar();
01728                                     }
01729                                     iCurrentAction = ACTION_NULL;
01730                                     SetEditorTerrainTaskbarMode( TERRAIN_FGROUND_TEXTURES );
01731                               }
01732                               break;
01733 
01734                         case 'h':
01735                               if( fBuildingShowRoofs ^= 1 )
01736                                     ClickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_ROOF_VIEW );
01737                               else
01738                                     UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_ROOF_VIEW );
01739                               UpdateRoofsView();
01740                               break;
01741 
01742                         case 'i':
01743                               if( !InOverheadMap() )
01744                                     GoIntoOverheadMap();
01745                               else
01746                                     KillOverheadMap();
01747                               break;
01748 
01749                         case 'l':
01750                               if (EditorInputEvent.usKeyState & CTRL_DOWN )
01751                               {
01752                                     UpdateLastActionBeforeLeaving();
01753                                     iCurrentAction = ACTION_LOAD_MAP;
01754                                     break;
01755                               }     
01756                               if ( iCurrentTaskbar != TASK_TERRAIN )
01757                               {
01758                                     iTaskMode = TASK_TERRAIN;
01759                                     DoTaskbar();
01760                               }
01761                               break;
01762                         case 'n':
01763                               if( fBuildingShowRoomInfo ^= 1 )
01764                               {
01765                                     SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_ROOMIDS );
01766                                     ClickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_INFO_VIEW );
01767                               }
01768                               else
01769                               {
01770                                     ClearRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_ROOMIDS );        
01771                                     UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_INFO_VIEW );
01772                               }
01773                               break;
01774                         case 'o': 
01775                               if ( iCurrentTaskbar != TASK_TERRAIN )
01776                               {
01777                                     iTaskMode = TASK_TERRAIN;
01778                                     DoTaskbar();
01779                               }
01780                               iCurrentAction = ACTION_NULL;
01781                               iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS2;
01782                               ClickEditorButton( TERRAIN_PLACE_MISC );                    
01783                               iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_DRAW_OSTRUCTS2;
01784                               break;
01785                         case 'r': // rocks
01786                               if ( iCurrentTaskbar != TASK_TERRAIN )
01787                               {
01788                                     iTaskMode = TASK_TERRAIN;
01789                                     DoTaskbar();
01790                               }
01791                               iCurrentAction = ACTION_NULL;
01792                               iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS1;
01793                               ClickEditorButton( TERRAIN_PLACE_ROCKS );                   
01794                               iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_DRAW_OSTRUCTS1;
01795                               break;
01796                         case 's':
01797                               if (EditorInputEvent.usKeyState & CTRL_DOWN )
01798                               {
01799                                     iCurrentAction = ACTION_SAVE_MAP;
01800                               }
01801                               break;
01802                         case 't':   // Trees
01803                               if ( iCurrentTaskbar != TASK_TERRAIN )
01804                               {
01805                                     iTaskMode = TASK_TERRAIN;
01806                                     DoTaskbar();
01807                               }
01808                               iCurrentAction = ACTION_NULL;
01809                               iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS;
01810                               ClickEditorButton( TERRAIN_PLACE_TREES );                   
01811                               iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_DRAW_OSTRUCTS;
01812                               break;
01813                         case 'T':
01814                               if ( fShowTrees )
01815                               {
01816                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Removing Treetops" );
01817                                     WorldHideTrees( );
01818                               }
01819                               else
01820                               {
01821                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Showing Treetops" );
01822                                     WorldShowTrees( );
01823                               }
01824                               fShowTrees = !fShowTrees;
01825 
01826                               break;
01827                         case 'u':
01828                               RaiseWorldLand();
01829                               break;
01830                         case 'w': // walls (full building)
01831                               if( fBuildingShowWalls ^= 1 )
01832                                     ClickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_WALL_VIEW );
01833                               else
01834                                     UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_WALL_VIEW );
01835                               UpdateWallsView();
01836                               break;
01837                         case 'v':
01838                               if( EditorInputEvent.usKeyState & CTRL_DOWN && iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_MERCS )
01839                               {
01840                                     iCurrentAction = ACTION_PASTE_MERC_PLACEMENT;
01841                               }
01842                               break;
01843 
01844                         case 'x': 
01845                               if (EditorInputEvent.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN )
01846                               { 
01847                                     if( InOverheadMap() )
01848                                           KillOverheadMap();
01849                                     if( gfEditingDoor )
01850                                           KillDoorEditing();
01851                                     iCurrentAction = ACTION_QUIT_GAME;
01852                                     return;
01853                               }
01854                               break;
01855                         case 'z':
01856                               iCurrentAction = ACTION_NEXT_SELECTIONTYPE;
01857                               break;
01858                         case ',':
01859                               gusSelectionType = LINESELECTION;
01860                               gusPreserveSelectionWidth--;
01861                               if( !gusPreserveSelectionWidth )
01862                                     gusPreserveSelectionWidth = 8;
01863                               gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
01864                               break;
01865                         case '.':
01866                               gusSelectionType = LINESELECTION;
01867                               gusPreserveSelectionWidth++;
01868                               if( gusPreserveSelectionWidth > 8 )
01869                                     gusPreserveSelectionWidth = 1;
01870                               gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
01871                         default:
01872                               iCurrentAction = ACTION_NULL;
01873                               break;
01874                   }
01875             }
01876       }
01877 }
01878 
01879 
01880 
01881 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01882 //    PerformSelectedAction
01883 //
01884 //    Perform the current user selected action, if any (or at least set things up for doing that)
01885 //
01886 UINT32 PerformSelectedAction( void )
01887 {
01888       UINT32 uiRetVal;
01889 
01890       uiRetVal = EDIT_SCREEN;
01891 
01892       switch ( iCurrentAction )
01893       {
01894             case ACTION_DENSITY_DOWN:
01895                   DecreaseSelectionDensity();
01896                   break;
01897             case ACTION_DENSITY_UP:
01898                   IncreaseSelectionDensity();
01899                   break;
01900 
01901             case ACTION_ERASE_WAYPOINT:
01902                   EraseMercWaypoint();
01903                   break;
01904       
01905             case ACTION_SET_WAYPOINT:
01906                   iMapIndex = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );               
01907                   AddMercWaypoint( iMapIndex );
01908                   break;
01909 
01910             case ACTION_RAISE_LAND:
01911                   RaiseWorldLand();
01912                   break;
01913 
01914             case ACTION_HELPSCREEN:
01915                   DisableEditorTaskbar( );
01916                   fHelpScreen = TRUE;
01917                   fAllDone = FALSE;
01918                   break;
01919       
01920             case ACTION_QUICK_ERASE:
01921                   if ( (gViewportRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA) && GetMouseXY( &sGridX, &sGridY ) )
01922                   {           
01923                         iMapIndex = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );
01924 
01925                         if ( iMapIndex < 0x8000 )
01926                         {
01927                               QuickEraseMapTile( iMapIndex );
01928                         }
01929                   }
01930                   break;
01931       
01932             case ACTION_QUIT_GAME:
01933                   gfProgramIsRunning = FALSE;
01934             case ACTION_EXIT_EDITOR:
01935                   if( EditModeShutdown( ) )
01936                   {
01937                         iPrevJA2ToolbarState = iEditorToolbarState;
01938                         iPrevDrawMode = iDrawMode;
01939                         PrevCurrentPaste = CurrentPaste;
01940                         gPrevCurrentBackground = gCurrentBackground;
01941                         fFirstTimeInGameScreen = TRUE;
01942                         return GAME_SCREEN;
01943                   }
01944                   return EDIT_SCREEN;
01945             case ACTION_GET_WALL:
01946             case ACTION_GET_DOOR:
01947             case ACTION_GET_WINDOW:
01948             case ACTION_GET_ROOF:
01949             case ACTION_GET_NEW_ROOF:
01950             case ACTION_GET_BROKEN_WALL:
01951             case ACTION_GET_DECOR:
01952             case ACTION_GET_DECAL:
01953             case ACTION_GET_FLOOR:
01954             case ACTION_GET_TOILET:
01955             case ACTION_GET_ROOM:
01956                   switch( iCurrentAction )
01957                   {
01958                         case ACTION_GET_WALL:                     CreateJA2SelectionWindow( SELWIN_SINGLEWALL );              break;
01959                         case ACTION_GET_DOOR:                     CreateJA2SelectionWindow( SELWIN_SINGLEDOOR );              break;
01960                         case ACTION_GET_WINDOW:             CreateJA2SelectionWindow( SELWIN_SINGLEWINDOW );            break;
01961                         case ACTION_GET_ROOF:                     CreateJA2SelectionWindow( SELWIN_SINGLEROOF );              break;
01962                         case ACTION_GET_NEW_ROOF:           CreateJA2SelectionWindow( SELWIN_SINGLENEWROOF );           break;
01963                         case ACTION_GET_BROKEN_WALL:CreateJA2SelectionWindow( SELWIN_SINGLEBROKENWALL );break;
01964                         case ACTION_GET_DECOR:              CreateJA2SelectionWindow( SELWIN_SINGLEDECOR );             break;
01965                         case ACTION_GET_DECAL:              CreateJA2SelectionWindow( SELWIN_SINGLEDECAL );             break;
01966                         case ACTION_GET_FLOOR:              CreateJA2SelectionWindow( SELWIN_SINGLEFLOOR );             break;
01967                         case ACTION_GET_TOILET:             CreateJA2SelectionWindow( SELWIN_SINGLETOILET );            break;
01968                         case ACTION_GET_ROOM:                     CreateJA2SelectionWindow( SELWIN_ROOM );                                break;
01969                   }
01970                   fSelectionWindow = TRUE;
01971                   fAllDone = FALSE;
01972                   break;
01973 
01974             case ACTION_NEW_MAP:
01975                   fNewMap = TRUE;
01976                   if( gfPendingBasement )
01977                         CreateMessageBox( L"Delete current map and start a new basement level?" );
01978                   else if( gfPendingCaves )
01979                         CreateMessageBox( L"Delete current map and start a new cave level?" );
01980                   else
01981                         CreateMessageBox( L"Delete current map and start a new outdoor level?" );
01982                   break;
01983 
01984             case ACTION_SET_NEW_BACKGROUND:
01985                   if (!fBeenWarned)
01986                         CreateMessageBox( L" Wipe out ground textures? " );
01987                   else
01988                   {
01989                         gCurrentBackground = TerrainBackgroundTile;
01990                         SetBackgroundTexture( );            
01991                         fBeenWarned = FALSE;
01992                   }
01993                   break;
01994 
01995             case ACTION_SUB_INDEX_UP:
01996                   gusSelectionType = SMALLSELECTION;
01997                   switch ( iDrawMode )
01998                   {
01999                         case DRAW_MODE_BANKS:
02000                               if ( iNumBanksSelected > 0 )  
02001                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + 1) % iNumBanksSelected;
02002                               break;
02003                         case DRAW_MODE_ROADS:
02004                               if ( iNumRoadsSelected > 0 )  
02005                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + 1) % iNumRoadsSelected;
02006                               break;
02007                         case DRAW_MODE_WALLS:
02008                               if ( iNumWallsSelected > 0 )  
02009                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + 1) % iNumWallsSelected;
02010                               break;
02011                         case DRAW_MODE_DOORS:
02012                               if ( iNumDoorsSelected > 0 )  
02013                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + 1) % iNumDoorsSelected;
02014                               break;
02015                         case DRAW_MODE_WINDOWS:
02016                               if ( iNumWindowsSelected > 0 )      
02017                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + 1) % iNumWindowsSelected;
02018                               break;
02019                         case DRAW_MODE_ROOFS:
02020                               if( iNumRoofsSelected > 0 )
02021                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + 1) % iNumRoofsSelected;
02022                               break;
02023                         case DRAW_MODE_BROKEN_WALLS:
02024                               if( iNumBrokenWallsSelected > 0 )
02025                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + 1) % iNumBrokenWallsSelected;
02026                               break;
02027                         case DRAW_MODE_DECOR:
02028                               if ( iNumDecorSelected > 0 )  
02029                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + 1) % iNumDecorSelected;
02030                               break;
02031                         case DRAW_MODE_DECALS:
02032                               if ( iNumDecalsSelected > 0 ) 
02033                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + 1) % iNumDecalsSelected;
02034                               break;
02035                         case DRAW_MODE_FLOORS:
02036                               if( iNumFloorsSelected > 0 )
02037                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + 1) % iNumFloorsSelected;
02038                               break;
02039                         case DRAW_MODE_TOILET:
02040                               if( iNumToiletsSelected > 0 )
02041                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + 1) % iNumToiletsSelected;
02042                               break;
02043                         case DRAW_MODE_NEWROOF:
02044                               if( iNumNewRoofsSelected > 0 )
02045                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + 1) % iNumNewRoofsSelected;
02046                               break;
02047                         case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS:
02048                               fDontUseRandom = TRUE;
02049                               if ( iNumOStructsSelected > 0 )
02050                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + 1) % iNumOStructsSelected;
02051                               break;
02052 
02053                         case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS1:
02054                               fDontUseRandom = TRUE;
02055                               if ( iNumOStructs1Selected > 0 )
02056                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + 1) % iNumOStructs1Selected;
02057                               break;
02058 
02059                         case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS2:
02060                               fDontUseRandom = TRUE;
02061                               if ( iNumOStructs2Selected > 0 )
02062                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + 1) % iNumOStructs2Selected;
02063                               break;
02064 
02065                         case DRAW_MODE_DEBRIS:
02066                               fDontUseRandom = TRUE;
02067                               if ( iNumDebrisSelected > 0 )
02068                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + 1) % iNumDebrisSelected;
02069                               break;
02070                   }
02071                   break;
02072 
02073             case ACTION_SUB_INDEX_DWN:
02074                   gusSelectionType = SMALLSELECTION;
02075                   switch ( iDrawMode )
02076                   {
02077                         case DRAW_MODE_BANKS:
02078                               if ( iNumBanksSelected > 0 )  
02079                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + (iNumBanksSelected - 1)) % iNumBanksSelected;
02080                               break;
02081                         case DRAW_MODE_ROADS:
02082                               if ( iNumRoadsSelected > 0 )  
02083                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + (iNumRoadsSelected - 1)) % iNumRoadsSelected;
02084                               break;
02085                         case DRAW_MODE_WALLS:
02086                               if ( iNumWallsSelected > 0 )  
02087                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + (iNumWallsSelected - 1)) % iNumWallsSelected;
02088                               break;
02089                         case DRAW_MODE_DOORS:
02090                               if ( iNumDoorsSelected > 0 )  
02091                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + (iNumDoorsSelected - 1)) % iNumDoorsSelected;
02092                               break;
02093                         case DRAW_MODE_WINDOWS:
02094                               if ( iNumWindowsSelected > 0 )      
02095                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + (iNumWindowsSelected - 1)) % iNumWindowsSelected;
02096                               break;
02097                         case DRAW_MODE_ROOFS:
02098                               if( iNumRoofsSelected > 0 )
02099                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + (iNumRoofsSelected - 1)) % iNumRoofsSelected;
02100                               break;
02101                         case DRAW_MODE_BROKEN_WALLS:
02102                               if ( iNumBrokenWallsSelected > 0 )  
02103                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + (iNumBrokenWallsSelected - 1)) % iNumBrokenWallsSelected;
02104                               break;
02105                         case DRAW_MODE_DECOR:
02106                               if ( iNumDecorSelected > 0 )  
02107                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + (iNumDecorSelected - 1)) % iNumDecorSelected;
02108                               break;
02109                         case DRAW_MODE_DECALS:
02110                               if ( iNumDecalsSelected > 0 ) 
02111                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + (iNumDecalsSelected - 1)) % iNumDecalsSelected;
02112                               break;
02113                         case DRAW_MODE_FLOORS:
02114                               if( iNumFloorsSelected > 0 )
02115                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + (iNumFloorsSelected - 1)) % iNumFloorsSelected;
02116                               break;
02117                         case DRAW_MODE_TOILET:
02118                               if( iNumToiletsSelected > 0 )
02119                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + (iNumToiletsSelected - 1)) % iNumToiletsSelected;
02120                               break;
02121                         case DRAW_MODE_NEWROOF:
02122                               if( iNumNewRoofsSelected > 0 )
02123                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + (iNumNewRoofsSelected - 1)) % iNumNewRoofsSelected;
02124                               break;
02125                         case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS:
02126                               fDontUseRandom = TRUE;
02127                               if ( iNumOStructsSelected > 0 )
02128                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + (iNumOStructsSelected - 1)) % iNumOStructsSelected;
02129                               break;
02130 
02131                         case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS1:
02132                               fDontUseRandom = TRUE;
02133                               if ( iNumOStructs1Selected > 0 )
02134                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + (iNumOStructs1Selected - 1)) % iNumOStructs1Selected;
02135                               break;
02136 
02137                         case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS2:
02138                               fDontUseRandom = TRUE;
02139                               if ( iNumOStructs2Selected > 0 )
02140                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + (iNumOStructs2Selected - 1)) % iNumOStructs2Selected;
02141                               break;
02142 
02143                         case DRAW_MODE_DEBRIS:
02144                               fDontUseRandom = TRUE;
02145                               if ( iNumDebrisSelected > 0 )
02146                                     iCurBank = (iCurBank + (iNumDebrisSelected - 1)) % iNumDebrisSelected;
02147                               break;
02148                   }
02149                   break;
02150             case ACTION_NEXT_FGRND:
02151                   break;
02152 
02153             case ACTION_NEXT_DEBRIS:
02154                   CreateJA2SelectionWindow( SELWIN_DEBRIS );
02155                   fSelectionWindow = TRUE;
02156                   fAllDone = FALSE;
02157                   break;
02158 
02159             case ACTION_PREV_SELECTIONTYPE:
02160                   gusSelectionType--;
02161                   if( gusSelectionType > AREASELECTION )
02162                         gusSelectionType = AREASELECTION;
02163                   gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
02164                   break;
02165             case ACTION_NEXT_SELECTIONTYPE:
02166                   gusSelectionType++;
02167                   if( gusSelectionType > AREASELECTION )
02168                         gusSelectionType = SMALLSELECTION;
02169                   gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
02170                   break;
02171 
02172             case ACTION_COPY_MERC_PLACEMENT:
02173                   GetMouseXY( &sGridX, &sGridY );
02174                   iMapIndex = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );
02175                   CopyMercPlacement( iMapIndex );
02176                   break;
02177             case ACTION_PASTE_MERC_PLACEMENT:
02178                   GetMouseXY( &sGridX, &sGridY );
02179                   iMapIndex = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );
02180                   PasteMercPlacement( iMapIndex );
02181                   break;
02182 
02183             case ACTION_SAVE_MAP:
02184                   UpdateLastActionBeforeLeaving();
02185                   return LOADSAVE_SCREEN;
02186 
02187             case ACTION_LOAD_MAP:   
02188                   UpdateLastActionBeforeLeaving();
02189                   return LOADSAVE_SCREEN;
02190 
02191             case ACTION_UNDO:
02192                   ExecuteUndoList( );
02193                   gfRenderWorld = TRUE;
02194                   break;
02195 
02196             case ACTION_NEXT_BANK:
02197                   CreateJA2SelectionWindow( SELWIN_BANKS );
02198                   fSelectionWindow = TRUE;
02199                   fAllDone = FALSE;
02200                   break;
02201 
02202             case ACTION_NEXT_ROAD:
02203                   CreateJA2SelectionWindow( SELWIN_ROADS );
02204                   fSelectionWindow = TRUE;
02205                   fAllDone = FALSE;
02206                   break;
02207 
02208             case ACTION_SHADE_UP:   
02209                   if ( EditorInputEvent.usKeyState & SHIFT_DOWN )
02210                   {
02211                         gShadePercent+= (FLOAT).05;
02212                   }
02213                   else
02214                   {
02215                         gShadePercent+= (FLOAT).01;
02216                   }
02217 
02218                   if ( gShadePercent > 1 )
02219                   {
02220                         gShadePercent = (FLOAT)0;
02221                   }
02222                   SetShadeTablePercent( gShadePercent );
02223                   break;
02224 
02225             case ACTION_SHADE_DWN:  
02226                   if ( EditorInputEvent.usKeyState & SHIFT_DOWN )
02227                   {
02228                         gShadePercent-= (FLOAT).05;
02229                   }
02230                   else
02231                   {
02232                         gShadePercent-= (FLOAT).01;
02233                   }
02234 
02235                   if ( gShadePercent < 0 )
02236                   {
02237                         gShadePercent = (FLOAT)1;
02238                   }
02239                   SetShadeTablePercent( gShadePercent );
02240                   break;
02241 
02242             case ACTION_WALL_PASTE1:      // Doors          //** Changes needed
02243                   GetMouseXY( &sGridX, &sGridY );
02244                   iMapIndex = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );
02245 
02246                   AddWallToStructLayer( iMapIndex, FIRSTWALL18, TRUE );
02247                   break;
02248 
02249             case ACTION_WALL_PASTE2:      // Windows  //** Changes Needed
02250                   GetMouseXY( &sGridX, &sGridY );
02251                   iMapIndex = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );
02252 
02253                   AddWallToStructLayer( iMapIndex, FIRSTWALL19, TRUE );
02254                   break;
02255 
02256             case ACTION_NEXT_STRUCT:      
02257                   CreateJA2SelectionWindow( SELWIN_OSTRUCTS );
02258                   fSelectionWindow = TRUE;
02259                   fAllDone = FALSE;
02260                   break;
02261             
02262             case ACTION_NEXT_STRUCT1:     
02263                   CreateJA2SelectionWindow( SELWIN_OSTRUCTS1 );
02264                   fSelectionWindow = TRUE;
02265                   fAllDone = FALSE;
02266                   break;
02267 
02268             case ACTION_NEXT_STRUCT2:     
02269                   CreateJA2SelectionWindow( SELWIN_OSTRUCTS2 );
02270                   fSelectionWindow = TRUE;
02271                   fAllDone = FALSE;
02272                   break;
02273 
02274             default:
02275                   break;
02276       }
02277 
02278       return( uiRetVal );
02279 }
02280 
02281 void CreateNewMap()
02282 {
02283       if( gfSummaryWindowActive )
02284             DestroySummaryWindow();
02285 
02286       if( !gfWorldLoaded )
02287             LoadMapTileset( 0 );
02288 
02289       LightReset();
02290       NewWorld( );
02291       if( gfPendingBasement )
02292       {
02293             UINT32 i;
02294             UINT16 usIndex;
02295             for ( i = 0; i < WORLD_MAX; i++ )
02296             {
02297                   // Set land index 9 + 3 variants
02298                   GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( FIRSTROOF, (UINT16)(9 + Random(3)), &usIndex );
02299                   AddRoofToHead( i, usIndex );
02300             }
02301             SetEditorSmoothingMode( SMOOTHING_BASEMENT );
02302       }
02303       else if( gfPendingCaves )
02304       {
02305             UINT32 i;
02306             UINT16 usIndex;
02307             for ( i = 0; i < WORLD_MAX; i++ )
02308             {
02309                   //Set up the default cave here.
02310                   GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( FIRSTWALL, (UINT16)(60 + Random(6)), &usIndex );
02311                   AddCave( i, usIndex );
02312             }
02313             SetEditorSmoothingMode( SMOOTHING_CAVES );
02314       }
02315       else
02316             SetEditorSmoothingMode( SMOOTHING_NORMAL );
02317       fNewMap = FALSE;
02318       RemoveAllFromUndoList( );
02319       UseEditorAlternateList();
02320       KillSoldierInitList();
02321       UseEditorOriginalList();
02322       KillSoldierInitList();
02323       HideEntryPoints();
02324       gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo = -1;
02325       gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo = -1;
02326       gMapInformation.sWestGridNo = -1;
02327       gMapInformation.sEastGridNo = -1;
02328 }
02329 
02330 
02331 UINT32 ProcessEditscreenMessageBoxResponse()
02332 {
02333       RemoveMessageBox();
02334       gfRenderWorld = TRUE;
02335       if( gfConfirmExitPending )
02336       {
02337             gfConfirmExitPending = FALSE;
02338             if( gfMessageBoxResult )
02339             {
02340                   gfConfirmExitFirst = FALSE;
02341                   iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_EXIT_EDIT;
02342             }
02343             return EDIT_SCREEN;
02344       }
02345       if( !gfMessageBoxResult )
02346             return EDIT_SCREEN;
02347       if( gfRemoveLightsPending )
02348       {
02349             INT32 i;
02350             LightReset();
02351             for( i = 0; i < WORLD_MAX; i++ )
02352             {
02353                   RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( i, GOODRING, GOODRING );
02354             }
02355             MarkWorldDirty();
02356             LightSetBaseLevel( (UINT8)(15 - ubAmbientLightLevel) );
02357             gfRemoveLightsPending = FALSE;
02358       }
02359       if( gfScheduleReversalPending )
02360       {
02361             IndicateSelectedMerc( SELECT_NO_MERC );
02362             ReverseSchedules();
02363             gfScheduleReversalPending = FALSE;
02364       }
02365       else if( gfScheduleClearPending )
02366       {
02367             IndicateSelectedMerc( SELECT_NO_MERC );
02368             ClearAllSchedules();
02369             gfScheduleClearPending = FALSE;
02370       }
02371       if( fNewMap )
02372       {
02373             CreateNewMap();
02374             return EDIT_SCREEN;
02375       }
02376       else if( iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_NEW_GROUND )
02377       {
02378             gCurrentBackground = TerrainBackgroundTile;
02379             SetBackgroundTexture( );            
02380             SetEditorTerrainTaskbarMode( TERRAIN_FGROUND_TEXTURES );
02381             return EDIT_SCREEN;
02382       }
02383       return EDIT_SCREEN;
02384 }
02385

02387 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02388 //    WaitForHelpScreenResponse
02389 //
02390 //    Displays a help screen and waits for the user to wisk it away.
02391 //
02392 UINT32 WaitForHelpScreenResponse( void )
02393 {
02394   InputAtom DummyEvent;
02395       BOOLEAN fLeaveScreen;
02396 
02397       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(FRAME_BUFFER,   50, 50, 590, 310,
02398                                                                               Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(136, 138, 135)) );
02399       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(FRAME_BUFFER,   51, 51, 590, 310,
02400                                                                               Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(24, 61, 81)) );
02401       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(FRAME_BUFFER,   51, 51, 589, 309,
02402                                                                               GenericButtonFillColors[0]);
02403 
02404       SetFont( gp12PointFont1 );
02405 
02406       gprintf( 55,  55, L"HOME" );
02407       gprintf( 205, 55, L"Toggle fake editor lighting ON/OFF" );
02408 
02409       gprintf( 55,  67, L"INSERT" );
02410       gprintf( 205, 67, L"Toggle fill mode ON/OFF" );
02411 
02412       gprintf( 55,  79, L"BKSPC" );
02413       gprintf( 205, 79, L"Undo last change" );
02414 
02415       gprintf( 55,  91, L"DEL" );
02416       gprintf( 205, 91, L"Quick erase object under mouse cursor" );
02417 
02418       gprintf( 55,  103, L"ESC" );
02419       gprintf( 205, 103, L"Exit editor" );
02420 
02421       gprintf( 55,  115, L"PGUP/PGDN" );
02422       gprintf( 205, 115, L"Change object to be pasted" );
02423 
02424       gprintf( 55,  127, L"F1" );
02425       gprintf( 205, 127, L"This help screen" );
02426 
02427       gprintf( 55,  139, L"F10" );
02428       gprintf( 205, 139, L"Save current map" );
02429 
02430       gprintf( 55,  151, L"F11" );
02431       gprintf( 205, 151, L"Load map as current" );
02432 
02433       gprintf( 55,  163, L"+/-" );
02434       gprintf( 205, 163, L"Change shadow darkness by .01" );
02435 
02436       gprintf( 55,  175, L"SHFT +/-" );
02437       gprintf( 205, 175, L"Change shadow darkness by .05" );
02438 
02439       gprintf( 55,  187, L"0 - 9" );
02440       gprintf( 205, 187, L"Change map/tileset filename" );
02441       
02442       gprintf( 55,  199, L"b" );
02443       gprintf( 205, 199, L"Change brush size" );
02444       
02445       gprintf( 55,  211, L"d" );
02446       gprintf( 205, 211, L"Draw debris" );
02447 
02448       gprintf( 55,  223, L"o" );
02449       gprintf( 205, 223, L"Draw obstacle" );
02450 
02451       gprintf( 55,  235, L"r" );
02452       gprintf( 205, 235, L"Draw rocks" );
02453 
02454       gprintf( 55,  247, L"t" );
02455       gprintf( 205, 247, L"Toggle trees display ON/OFF" );
02456 
02457       gprintf( 55,  259, L"g" );
02458       gprintf( 205, 259, L"Draw ground textures" );
02459 
02460       gprintf( 55,  271, L"w" );
02461       gprintf( 205, 271, L"Draw building walls" );
02462 
02463       gprintf( 55,  283, L"e" );
02464       gprintf( 205, 283, L"Toggle erase mode ON/OFF" );
02465 
02466       gprintf( 55,  295, L"h" );
02467       gprintf( 205, 295, L"Toggle roofs ON/OFF" );
02468 
02469 
02470       fLeaveScreen = FALSE;
02471 
02472       while (DequeueEvent(&DummyEvent) == TRUE)
02473       {
02474             if ( DummyEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )
02475             {
02476                   switch( DummyEvent.usParam )
02477                   {
02478                         case SPACE:
02479                         case ESC:
02480                         case ENTER:
02481                         case F1:
02482                               fLeaveScreen = TRUE;
02483                               break;
02484                   }
02485             }
02486       }
02487 
02488 
02489       if ( (_LeftButtonDown) || (_RightButtonDown) || fLeaveScreen )
02490       {
02491             fHelpScreen = FALSE;
02492             
02493             while( DequeueEvent( &DummyEvent ) )
02494                   continue;
02495 
02496             EnableEditorTaskbar();
02497       }
02498 
02499       InvalidateScreen( );
02500       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
02501       EndFrameBufferRender();
02502 
02503       return( EDIT_SCREEN );
02504 }

02507 
02508 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02509 //    WaitForSelectionWindowResponse
02510 //
02511 //    Handles all keyboard input and display for a selection window.
02512 //
02513 UINT32 WaitForSelectionWindowResponse( void )
02514 {
02515   InputAtom DummyEvent;
02516 
02517       while (DequeueEvent(&DummyEvent) == TRUE)
02518       {
02519             if ( DummyEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )
02520             {
02521                   switch( DummyEvent.usParam )
02522                   {
02523                         case SPACE:
02524                               ClearSelectionList();
02525                               break;
02526 
02527                         case DNARROW:
02528                               ScrollSelWinDown();
02529                               break;
02530 
02531                         case UPARROW:
02532                               ScrollSelWinUp();
02533                               break;
02534 
02535                         case ESC:
02536                               RestoreSelectionList();
02537                         case ENTER:
02538                               fAllDone = TRUE;
02539                               break;
02540                   }
02541             }
02542       }
02543       
02544       if ( DoWindowSelection( ) )
02545       {
02546             fSelectionWindow = FALSE;
02547             ShutdownJA2SelectionWindow( );
02548             // Quick hack to trash the mouse event queue.
02549             while( DequeueEvent( &DummyEvent ) )
02550                   continue;
02551 
02552             iCurBank = 0;
02553 
02554             if( iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_SLANTED_ROOF || iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_ROOM )
02555             {
02556                   if( CheckForSlantRoofs() )
02557                         iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_SLANTED_ROOF;
02558             }
02559             InvalidateScreen( );
02560             ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
02561             EndFrameBufferRender( );
02562       }
02563       else
02564       {
02565             DisplaySelectionWindowGraphicalInformation();
02566             InvalidateScreen( );
02567             ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
02568             EndFrameBufferRender( );
02569       }
02570 
02571       return( EDIT_SCREEN );
02572 }
