02595 
02596 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02597 //    ShowCurrentSlotSurface
02598 //
02599 //    Displays the image of the currently highlighted tileset slot if it's a video surface.
02600 //    (usually a 16 bit image)
02601 //
02602 void ShowCurrentSlotSurface( UINT32 vSurface, INT32 iWindow )
02603 {
02604       SGPRect                 ClipRect, WinRect;
02605       INT32                   iStartX;
02606       INT32                   iStartY;
02607       INT32                   iPicHeight, iPicWidth;
02608       HVSURFACE         hvSurface;
02609       INT32                   iWinWidth, iWinHeight;
02610       blt_vs_fx         vSfx;
02611 
02612       WinRect.iLeft = (iWindow == 0) ? (336) : (488);
02613       WinRect.iTop = 211;
02614       WinRect.iRight = (iWindow == 0) ? (485) : (637);
02615       WinRect.iBottom = 399;
02616 
02617       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(FRAME_BUFFER, WinRect.iLeft - 1, WinRect.iTop - 1, 
02618                                                                                                                               WinRect.iRight + 1, WinRect.iBottom + 1, 
02619                                                                                                                               Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(128, 0, 0)) );
02620 
02621       iWinWidth = WinRect.iRight - WinRect.iLeft;
02622       iWinHeight = WinRect.iBottom - WinRect.iTop;
02623 
02624       GetVideoSurface( &hvSurface, vSurface );
02625 
02626       iPicWidth = (INT32)hvSurface->usWidth;
02627       iPicHeight = (INT32)hvSurface->usHeight;
02628 
02629       if ( iPicWidth > iWinWidth )
02630       {
02631             ClipRect.iLeft = (iPicWidth - iWinWidth) / 2;
02632             ClipRect.iRight = ClipRect.iLeft + iWinWidth - 1;
02633             iStartX = WinRect.iLeft;
02634       }
02635       else
02636       {
02637             ClipRect.iLeft = 0;
02638             ClipRect.iRight = iPicWidth - 1;
02639             iStartX = ((iWinWidth - iPicWidth) / 2) + WinRect.iLeft;
02640       }
02641 
02642       if ( iPicHeight > iWinHeight )
02643       {
02644             ClipRect.iTop = (iPicHeight - iWinHeight) / 2;
02645             ClipRect.iBottom = ClipRect.iTop + iWinHeight - 1;
02646             iStartY = WinRect.iTop;
02647       }
02648       else
02649       {
02650             ClipRect.iTop = 0;
02651             ClipRect.iBottom = iPicHeight - 1;
02652             iStartY = ((iWinHeight - iPicHeight) / 2) + WinRect.iTop;
02653       }
02654 
02655       vSfx.SrcRect = ClipRect;
02656       BltVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, vSurface, 0, 
02657                                                                                                  iStartX, iStartY, 
02658                                                                                                  VS_BLT_SRCSUBRECT, &vSfx );
02659 }
02660 
02661 
02662 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02663 //    ShowCurrentSlotImage
02664 //
02665 //    Displays the image of the currently highlighted tileset slot image. Usually this is for 
02666 //    8 bit image (.STI) files
02667 //
02668 void ShowCurrentSlotImage( HVOBJECT hVObj, INT32 iWindow )
02669 {
02670       SGPRect                 ClipRect, NewRect;
02671       INT32                   iStartX;
02672       INT32                   iStartY;
02673       INT32                   iPicHeight, iPicWidth;
02674       INT16                   sTempOffsetX;
02675       INT16                   sTempOffsetY;
02676       ETRLEObject *pETRLEObject;
02677       INT32                   iWinWidth, iWinHeight;
02678 
02679       NewRect.iLeft = (iWindow == 0) ? (336) : (488);
02680       NewRect.iTop = 211;
02681       NewRect.iRight = (iWindow == 0) ? (485) : (637);
02682       NewRect.iBottom = 399;
02683 
02684       iWinWidth = NewRect.iRight - NewRect.iLeft;
02685       iWinHeight = NewRect.iBottom - NewRect.iTop;
02686 
02687       GetClippingRect(&ClipRect);
02688       SetClippingRect(&NewRect);
02689 
02690       pETRLEObject = &(hVObj->pETRLEObject[0]);
02691 
02692       iPicWidth = (INT32)pETRLEObject->usWidth;
02693       iPicHeight = (INT32)pETRLEObject->usHeight;
02694 
02695       iStartX = ( (iWinWidth - iPicWidth) / 2 ) + NewRect.iLeft;
02696       iStartY = ( (iWinHeight - iPicHeight) / 2 ) + NewRect.iTop;
02697 
02698       // We have to store the offset data in temp variables before zeroing them and blitting
02699       sTempOffsetX = pETRLEObject->sOffsetX;
02700       sTempOffsetY = pETRLEObject->sOffsetY;
02701 
02702       // Set the offsets used for blitting to 0
02703       pETRLEObject->sOffsetX = 0;
02704       pETRLEObject->sOffsetY = 0;
02705 
02706       SetObjectShade( hVObj, DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL );
02707       BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hVObj, 0, (iStartX), (iStartY), 
02708                                                  VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL);
02709 
02710       pETRLEObject->sOffsetX = sTempOffsetX;
02711       pETRLEObject->sOffsetY = sTempOffsetY;
02712 
02713       SetClippingRect(&ClipRect);
02714 }
02715 
02716 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02717 //    PlaceLight
02718 //
02719 //    Creates and places a light of selected radius and color into the world.
02720 //
02721 BOOLEAN PlaceLight( INT16 sRadius, INT16 iMapX, INT16 iMapY, INT16 sType )
02722 {
02723       INT32 iLightHandle;
02724       UINT8 ubIntensity;
02725       STRING512 Filename;
02726       INT32 iMapIndex;
02727       UINT16 usTmpIndex;
02728 
02729       sprintf( Filename, "L-R%02d.LHT", sRadius );
02730 
02731       // Attempt to create light
02732       if ( (iLightHandle = LightSpriteCreate( Filename, sType )) == (-1) )
02733       {
02734             // Couldn't load file because it doesn't exist. So let's make the file
02735             ubIntensity = (UINT8)((float)sRadius / LIGHT_DECAY);
02736             if ( (iLightHandle = LightCreateOmni( ubIntensity, sRadius )) == (-1) )
02737             {
02738                   // Can't create light template            
02739                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_GAME, DBG_LEVEL_1, String("PlaceLight: Can't create light template for radius %d",sRadius) );
02740                   return( FALSE );
02741             }
02742 
02743             if ( !LightSave( iLightHandle, Filename ) )
02744             {
02745                   // Can't save light template        
02746                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_GAME, DBG_LEVEL_1, String("PlaceLight: Can't save light template for radius %d",sRadius) );
02747                   return( FALSE );
02748             }           
02749 
02750             if ( (iLightHandle = LightSpriteCreate( Filename, sType )) == (-1) )
02751             {
02752                   // Can't create sprite  
02753                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_GAME, DBG_LEVEL_1, String("PlaceLight: Can't create light sprite of radius %d",sRadius) );
02754                   return( FALSE );
02755             }
02756       }
02757 
02758       if ( !LightSpritePower( iLightHandle, TRUE ) )
02759       {
02760             // Can't turn this light on         
02761             DebugMsg(TOPIC_GAME, DBG_LEVEL_1, String("PlaceLight: Can't turn on light %d",iLightHandle) );
02762             return( FALSE );
02763       }
02764 
02765       if ( !LightSpritePosition( iLightHandle, iMapX, iMapY ) )
02766       {
02767             // Can't set light's position
02768             DebugMsg(TOPIC_GAME, DBG_LEVEL_1, String("PlaceLight: Can't set light position for light %d",iLightHandle) );
02769             return( FALSE );
02770       }
02771 
02772       switch( gbDefaultLightType )
02773       {
02774             case PRIMETIME_LIGHT:
02775                   LightSprites[ iLightHandle ].uiFlags |= LIGHT_PRIMETIME;
02776                   break;
02777             case NIGHTTIME_LIGHT:
02778                   LightSprites[ iLightHandle ].uiFlags |= LIGHT_NIGHTTIME;
02779                   break;
02780       }
02781 
02782       iMapIndex = ((INT32)iMapY * WORLD_COLS) + (INT32)iMapX;
02783       if ( !TypeExistsInObjectLayer( iMapIndex, GOODRING, &usTmpIndex ) )
02784       {
02785             AddObjectToHead( iMapIndex, GOODRING1 );
02786             gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pObjectHead->ubShadeLevel = DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
02787       }
02788 
02789       AddLightToUndoList( iMapIndex, 0, 0 );
02790 
02791       return( TRUE );
02792 }
02793 
02794 
02795 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02796 //    RemoveLight
02797 //
02798 //    Removes (erases) all lights at a given map tile location. Lights that are attached to a merc 
02799 //    are not deleted.
02800 //
02801 //    Returns TRUE if deleted the light, otherwise, returns FALSE. 
02802 //    i.e. FALSE is not an error condition!
02803 //
02804 BOOLEAN RemoveLight( INT16 iMapX, INT16 iMapY )
02805 {
02806       INT32 iCount;
02807       UINT16 cnt;
02808       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02809       BOOLEAN fSoldierLight;
02810       BOOLEAN fRemovedLight;
02811       INT32 iMapIndex;
02812       UINT32 uiLastLightType;
02813       UINT8 *pLastLightName;
02814 
02815       fRemovedLight = FALSE;
02816 
02817       // Check all lights if any at this given position
02818       for(iCount=0; iCount < MAX_LIGHT_SPRITES; iCount++)
02819       {
02820             if(LightSprites[iCount].uiFlags & LIGHT_SPR_ACTIVE)
02821             {           
02822                   if ( LightSprites[iCount].iX == iMapX && LightSprites[iCount].iY == iMapY )
02823                   {
02824                         // Found a light, so let's see if it belong to a merc!
02825                         fSoldierLight = FALSE;
02826                         for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS && !fSoldierLight; cnt++ )
02827                         {
02828                               if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, cnt ) )
02829                               {
02830                                     if ( pSoldier->iLight == iCount )
02831                                           fSoldierLight = TRUE;
02832                               }
02833                         }
02834 
02835                         if ( !fSoldierLight )
02836                         {
02837                               // Ok, it's not a merc's light so kill it!
02838                               pLastLightName = (UINT8 *) LightSpriteGetTypeName( iCount );
02839                               uiLastLightType = LightSprites[iCount].uiLightType;
02840                               LightSpritePower( iCount, FALSE );
02841                               LightSpriteDestroy( iCount );
02842                               fRemovedLight = TRUE;
02843                               iMapIndex = ((INT32)iMapY * WORLD_COLS) + (INT32)iMapX;
02844                               RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, GOODRING, GOODRING );
02845                         }
02846                   }
02847             }
02848       }
02849       if( fRemovedLight )
02850       { 
02851             UINT16 usRadius;
02852             //Assuming that the light naming convention doesn't change, then this following conversion 
02853             //should work.  Basically, the radius values aren't stored in the lights, so I have pull
02854             //the radius out of the filename.  Ex:  L-RO5.LHT
02855             usRadius = pLastLightName[4] - 0x30;
02856             AddLightToUndoList( iMapIndex, usRadius, (UINT8)uiLastLightType );
02857       }
02858 
02859       return( fRemovedLight );
02860 }
02861 
02862 
02863 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02864 //    ShowLightPositionHandles
02865 //
02866 //    For all lights that are in the world (except lights attached to mercs), this function places
02867 //    a marker at it's location for editing purposes. 
02868 //
02869 void ShowLightPositionHandles( void )
02870 {
02871       INT32 iCount;
02872       INT32 iMapIndex;
02873       UINT16 cnt;
02874       UINT16 usTmpIndex;
02875       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02876       BOOLEAN fSoldierLight;
02877 
02878       // Check all lights and place a position handle there!
02879       for(iCount=0; iCount < MAX_LIGHT_SPRITES; iCount++)
02880       {
02881             if(LightSprites[iCount].uiFlags & LIGHT_SPR_ACTIVE)
02882             {           
02883                   // Found a light, so let's see if it belong to a merc!
02884                   fSoldierLight = FALSE;
02885                   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS && !fSoldierLight; cnt++ )
02886                   {
02887                         if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, cnt ) )
02888                         {
02889                               if ( pSoldier->iLight == iCount )
02890                                     fSoldierLight = TRUE;
02891                         }
02892                   }
02893 
02894                   if ( !fSoldierLight )
02895                   {
02896                         iMapIndex = ((INT32)LightSprites[iCount].iY * WORLD_COLS) + (INT32)LightSprites[iCount].iX;
02897                         if ( !TypeExistsInObjectLayer( iMapIndex, GOODRING, &usTmpIndex ) )
02898                         {
02899                               AddObjectToHead( iMapIndex, GOODRING1 );
02900                               gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pObjectHead->ubShadeLevel = DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
02901                         }
02902                   }
02903             }
02904       }
02905 }
02906 
02907 
02908 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02909 //    RemoveLightPositionHandles
02910 //
02911 //    Scans through all light currently in the world and removes any light markers that may be present.
02912 //
02913 void RemoveLightPositionHandles( void )
02914 {
02915       INT32 iCount;
02916       INT32 iMapIndex;
02917       UINT16 cnt;
02918       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02919       BOOLEAN fSoldierLight;
02920 
02921       // Check all lights and remove the position handle there!
02922       for(iCount=0; iCount < MAX_LIGHT_SPRITES; iCount++)
02923       {
02924             if(LightSprites[iCount].uiFlags & LIGHT_SPR_ACTIVE)
02925             {           
02926                   // Found a light, so let's see if it belong to a merc!
02927                   fSoldierLight = FALSE;
02928                   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS && !fSoldierLight; cnt++ )
02929                   {
02930                         if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, cnt ) )
02931                         {
02932                               if ( pSoldier->iLight == iCount )
02933                                     fSoldierLight = TRUE;
02934                         }
02935                   }
02936 
02937                   if ( !fSoldierLight )
02938                   {
02939                         iMapIndex = ((INT32)LightSprites[iCount].iY * WORLD_COLS) + (INT32)LightSprites[iCount].iX;
02940                         RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, GOODRING, GOODRING );
02941                   }
02942             }
02943       }
02944 }

02954 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02955 //    CheckForSlantRoofs
02956 //
02957 //    Verifies whether there are any slant roofs selected in the "multiwall" or "room" selection list.
02958 //    if so, and no flat roofs were selected, then we return TRUE, otherwise we return FALSE.
02959 //
02960 //    This function is used to determine if we should force the area selection of rooms to handle
02961 //    slant roofs (which require at least one side to be exactly 8 tiles wide)
02962 //
02963 BOOLEAN CheckForSlantRoofs( void )
02964 {
02965       UINT16 usCheck;
02966       
02967       pSelList = SelRoom;
02968       pNumSelList = &iNumRoomsSelected;
02969 
02970       usCheck = GetRandomIndexByRange( FIRSTROOF, LASTROOF );
02971       if ( usCheck != 0xffff )
02972             return( FALSE );
02973 
02974       usCheck = GetRandomIndexByRange( FIRSTSLANTROOF, LASTSLANTROOF );
02975       return ( usCheck != 0xffff );
02976 }
02977

02979 
02980 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02981 //    MapOptimize
02982 //
02983 //    Runs through all map locations, and if it's outside the visible world, then we remove
02984 //    EVERYTHING from it since it will never be seen! 
02985 //
02986 //    If it can be seen, then we remove all extraneous land tiles. We find the tile that has the first
02987 //    FULL TILE indicator, and delete anything that may come after it (it'll never be seen anyway)
02988 //
02989 //    Doing the above has shown to free up about 1.1 Megs on the default map. Deletion of non-viewable
02990 //    land pieces alone gained us about 600 K of memory.
02991 // 
02992 void MapOptimize(void)
02993 {
02994 #if 0
02995       INT16 gridno;
02996       LEVELNODE *start, *head, *end, *node, *temp;
02997       MAP_ELEMENT       *pMapTile;
02998       BOOLEAN fFound, fChangedHead, fChangedTail;
02999 
03000       for( gridno = 0; gridno < WORLD_MAX; gridno++ )
03001       {
03002             if ( !GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( gridno ) )
03003             {
03004                   // Tile isn't in viewable area so trash everything in it
03005                   TrashMapTile( gridno );
03006             }
03007             else
03008             {
03009                   // Tile is in viewable area so try to optimize any extra land pieces
03010                   pMapTile = &gpWorldLevelData[ gridno ];
03011                   
03012                   node = start = pMapTile->pLandStart;
03013                   head = pMapTile->pLandHead;
03014 
03015                   if ( start == NULL )
03016                         node = start = head;
03017 
03018                   end = pMapTile->pLandTail;
03019                   
03020                   fChangedHead = fChangedTail = fFound = FALSE;
03021                   while ( !fFound && node != NULL )
03022                   {
03023                         if ( gTileDatabase[node->usIndex].ubFullTile == 1 )
03024                               fFound = TRUE;
03025                         else
03026                               node = node->pNext;
03027                   }
03028 
03029                   if(fFound)
03030                   {
03031                         // Delete everything up to the start node
03032 /*
03033 // Not having this means we still keep the smoothing
03034 
03035                         while( head != start && head != NULL )
03036                         {
03037                               fChangedHead = TRUE;
03038                               temp = head->pNext;
03039                               MemFree( head );
03040                               head = temp;
03041                               if ( head )
03042                                     head->pPrev = NULL;
03043                         }
03044 */
03045 
03046                         // Now delete from the end to "node"
03047                         while( end != node && end != NULL ) 
03048                         {
03049                               fChangedTail = TRUE;
03050                               temp = end->pPrev;
03051                               MemFree( end );
03052                               end = temp;
03053                               if ( end )
03054                                     end->pNext = NULL;
03055                         }
03056 
03057                         if ( fChangedHead )
03058                               pMapTile->pLandHead = head;
03059 
03060                         if ( fChangedTail )
03061                               pMapTile->pLandTail = end;
03062                   }
03063             }
03064       }
03065 
03066 #endif
03067 }
03068 
03069 
03070 
03071 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03072 //    CheckForFences
03073 //
03074 //    Verifies whether the selection list has only fence pieces. If so, turns off random selection
03075 //    for that selection list.
03076 //
03077 //    if ANY piece other than a fence piece exists in the selection list, then we want to keep
03078 //    random selections.
03079 //
03080 BOOLEAN CheckForFences( void )
03081 {
03082       UINT16 usCheck;
03083       BOOLEAN fFence;
03084       TILE_ELEMENT *T;
03085 
03086       pSelList = SelOStructs2;
03087       pNumSelList = &iNumOStructs2Selected;
03088 
03089       fFence = TRUE;
03090 
03091       for ( usCheck = 0; usCheck < iNumOStructs2Selected; usCheck++ )
03092       {
03093             T = &gTileDatabase[gTileTypeStartIndex[pSelList[usCheck].uiObject]];
03094             if ( T->pDBStructureRef == NULL )
03095                   fFence = FALSE;
03096             else if ( !(T->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ANYFENCE) )
03097                   fFence = FALSE;
03098       }
03099 
03100       return( fFence );
03101 }
03102 
03103 void EnsureStatusOfEditorButtons()  
03104 {
03105       if ( iDrawMode >= DRAW_MODE_ERASE )
03106       {
03107             ClickEditorButton( TERRAIN_TOGGLE_ERASEMODE );
03108             ClickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_ERASEMODE );
03109             ClickEditorButton( MAPINFO_TOGGLE_ERASEMODE );
03110       }
03111       else
03112       {
03113             UnclickEditorButton( TERRAIN_TOGGLE_ERASEMODE );
03114             UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_ERASEMODE );
03115             UnclickEditorButton( MAPINFO_TOGGLE_ERASEMODE );
03116       }
03117 
03118       //disable erase buttons if drawing caves
03119       if( iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_CAVES || iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_NEWROOF )
03120             DisableEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_ERASEMODE );
03121       else
03122             EnableEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_ERASEMODE );
03123 
03124       // Ensure that the fill button is on or off depending on our current mode
03125       if ( iDrawMode == (DRAW_MODE_GROUND + DRAW_MODE_FILL_AREA) )
03126             ClickEditorButton( TERRAIN_FILL_AREA );
03127       else
03128             UnclickEditorButton( TERRAIN_FILL_AREA );
03129 
03130       // Make sure that the fake-lighting button is down if appropriate
03131       if ( gfFakeLights )
03132             ClickEditorButton( MAPINFO_TOGGLE_FAKE_LIGHTS );
03133       else
03134             UnclickEditorButton( MAPINFO_TOGGLE_FAKE_LIGHTS );
03135 }
03136 
03137 void HandleMouseClicksInGameScreen()
03138 {
03139       EXITGRID dummy={0,0,0,0};
03140       INT16 sX, sY;
03141       BOOLEAN fPrevState;
03142       if( !GetMouseXY( &sGridX, &sGridY ) )
03143             return;
03144       if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_OPTIONS || iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_NONE )
03145       { //if in taskbar modes which don't process clicks in the world.
03146             return;
03147       }
03148       if( !(gViewportRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA ) )
03149       {     //if mouse cursor not in the game screen.
03150             return;
03151       }
03152       
03153       iMapIndex = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );
03154 
03155       fPrevState = gfRenderWorld;
03156 
03157       if( _LeftButtonDown )
03158       {
03159             gfRenderWorld = TRUE;
03160             // Are we trying to erase something?
03161             if ( iDrawMode >= DRAW_MODE_ERASE )
03162             {
03163                   // Erasing can have a brush size larger than 1 tile
03164                   for ( sY = (INT16)gSelectRegion.iTop; sY <= (INT16)gSelectRegion.iBottom; sY++ )
03165                   {
03166                         for ( sX = (INT16)gSelectRegion.iLeft; sX <= (INT16)gSelectRegion.iRight; sX++ )
03167                         {
03168                               if ( iDrawMode == (DRAW_MODE_LIGHT + DRAW_MODE_ERASE) )
03169                               {
03170                                     RemoveLight( sX, sY );
03171                               }
03172                               else
03173                               EraseMapTile( MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sY, sX ) );
03174                         }
03175                   }
03176 
03177                   if( iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_LIGHT + DRAW_MODE_ERASE )
03178                         LightSpriteRenderAll(); // To adjust building's lighting
03179                   return;
03180             }
03181             
03182             switch ( iDrawMode )
03183             {
03184                   case DRAW_MODE_SCHEDULEACTION:
03185                         if( IsLocationSittableExcludingPeople( iMapIndex, FALSE ) )
03186                         {
03187                               iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_SCHEDULECONFIRM;
03188                               gfFirstPlacement = FALSE;
03189                         }
03190                         break;
03191                   case DRAW_MODE_NORTHPOINT:
03192                   case DRAW_MODE_WESTPOINT:
03193                   case DRAW_MODE_EASTPOINT:
03194                   case DRAW_MODE_SOUTHPOINT:
03195                   case DRAW_MODE_CENTERPOINT:
03196                   case DRAW_MODE_ISOLATEDPOINT:
03197                         SpecifyEntryPoint( iMapIndex );
03198                         break;
03199 
03200                   case DRAW_MODE_ENEMY:
03201                   case DRAW_MODE_CREATURE:
03202                   case DRAW_MODE_REBEL:
03203                   case DRAW_MODE_CIVILIAN:
03204                         // Handle adding mercs to the world
03205                         if( gfFirstPlacement )
03206                         {
03207                               AddMercToWorld( iMapIndex );
03208                               gfFirstPlacement = FALSE;
03209                         }
03210                         break;
03211                   
03212                   case DRAW_MODE_LIGHT:
03213                         // Add a normal light to the world
03214                         if( gfFirstPlacement )
03215                         {
03216                               PlaceLight( gsLightRadius, sGridX, sGridY, 0 );
03217                               gfFirstPlacement = FALSE;
03218                         }
03219                         break;
03220 
03221                   case DRAW_MODE_SAW_ROOM:
03222                   case DRAW_MODE_ROOM:
03223                   case DRAW_MODE_CAVES:
03224                         if( gusSelectionType >= SMALLSELECTION && gusSelectionType <= XLARGESELECTION )
03225                               ProcessAreaSelection( TRUE );
03226                         break;
03227                   case DRAW_MODE_NEWROOF:
03228                         ReplaceBuildingWithNewRoof( iMapIndex );
03229                         break;
03230 
03231                   case DRAW_MODE_WALLS:                                             PasteSingleWall( iMapIndex );                         break;
03232                   case DRAW_MODE_DOORS:                                             PasteSingleDoor( iMapIndex );                         break;
03233                   case DRAW_MODE_WINDOWS:                                     PasteSingleWindow( iMapIndex );                       break;
03234                   case DRAW_MODE_ROOFS:                                             PasteSingleRoof( iMapIndex );                         break;
03235                   case DRAW_MODE_BROKEN_WALLS:                    PasteSingleBrokenWall( iMapIndex );       break;
03236                   case DRAW_MODE_DECOR:                                             PasteSingleDecoration( iMapIndex );       break;
03237                   case DRAW_MODE_DECALS:
03238                         if( ValidDecalPlacement( iMapIndex ) )
03239                               PasteSingleDecal( iMapIndex );
03240                         break;
03241                   case DRAW_MODE_TOILET:                                      PasteSingleToilet( iMapIndex );                       break;
03242                   case DRAW_MODE_SMART_WALLS:                           PasteSmartWall( iMapIndex );                          break;
03243                   case DRAW_MODE_SMART_DOORS:                           PasteSmartDoor( iMapIndex );                          break;
03244                   case DRAW_MODE_SMART_WINDOWS:                   PasteSmartWindow( iMapIndex );                        break;
03245                   case DRAW_MODE_SMART_BROKEN_WALLS:  PasteSmartBrokenWall( iMapIndex );        break;
03246                   case DRAW_MODE_EXITGRID:
03247                   case DRAW_MODE_FLOORS:                                      
03248                   case DRAW_MODE_GROUND:
03249                   case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS:
03250                   case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS1:
03251                   case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS2:
03252                   case DRAW_MODE_DEBRIS:
03253                         if( gusSelectionType >= SMALLSELECTION && gusSelectionType <= XLARGESELECTION )
03254                         {
03255                               DrawObjectsBasedOnSelectionRegion();
03256                         }
03257                         else
03258                               gfRenderWorld = fPrevState;
03259                         break;
03260                   case DRAW_MODE_DOORKEYS:
03261                         InitDoorEditing( iMapIndex );
03262                         break;
03263                   case DRAW_MODE_KILL_BUILDING:
03264                         KillBuilding( iMapIndex );
03265                         break;
03266                   case DRAW_MODE_COPY_BUILDING:
03267                   case DRAW_MODE_MOVE_BUILDING:
03268                         if( gfFirstPlacement )
03269                         {
03270                               CopyBuilding( iMapIndex );
03271                               gfFirstPlacement = FALSE;
03272                         }
03273                         gfRenderWorld = fPrevState;
03274                         break;
03275                   case DRAW_MODE_BANKS:
03276                         PasteBanks( iMapIndex, gsBanksSubIndex, TRUE );
03277                         break;
03278                   case DRAW_MODE_ROADS:
03279                         PasteRoads( iMapIndex );
03280                         break;
03281                   case (DRAW_MODE_GROUND + DRAW_MODE_FILL_AREA):
03282                         TerrainFill( iMapIndex );
03283                         //BeginFill( iMapIndex );
03284                         break;
03285                   case DRAW_MODE_PLACE_ITEM:
03286                         if( gfFirstPlacement )
03287                         {
03288                               AddSelectedItemToWorld( (UINT16)iMapIndex );
03289                               gfFirstPlacement = FALSE;
03290                         }
03291                         break;
03292                   default:
03293                         gfRenderWorld = fPrevState;
03294                         break;
03295             }
03296       }
03297       else if ( _RightButtonDown )
03298       {
03299             gfRenderWorld = TRUE;
03300             switch( iDrawMode )
03301             {
03302                   // Handle right clicking on a merc (for editing/moving him)
03303                   case DRAW_MODE_ENEMY:
03304                   case DRAW_MODE_CREATURE:
03305                   case DRAW_MODE_REBEL:
03306                   case DRAW_MODE_CIVILIAN:
03307                         HandleRightClickOnMerc( iMapIndex );
03308                         break;
03309                   case DRAW_MODE_PLACE_ITEM:
03310                         HandleRightClickOnItem( (UINT16)iMapIndex );
03311                         break;
03312 
03313                   // Handle the right clicks in the main window to bring up the appropriate selection window
03314                   case DRAW_MODE_WALLS:                           iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_WALL;                         break;
03315                   case DRAW_MODE_DOORS:                           iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_DOOR;                         break;
03316                   case DRAW_MODE_WINDOWS:                   iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_WINDOW;                       break;
03317                   case DRAW_MODE_ROOFS:                           iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_ROOF;                         break;
03318                   case DRAW_MODE_BROKEN_WALLS:  iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_BROKEN_WALL;      break;
03319                   case DRAW_MODE_DECOR:                           iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_DECOR;                        break;
03320                   case DRAW_MODE_DECALS:                    iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_DECAL;                        break;
03321                   case DRAW_MODE_FLOORS:                    iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_FLOOR;                        break;
03322                   case DRAW_MODE_TOILET:                    iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_TOILET;                       break;
03323 
03324                   case DRAW_MODE_ROOM:                            iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_ROOM;                         break;
03325                   case DRAW_MODE_NEWROOF:                   iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_NEW_ROOF;               break;
03326                   case DRAW_MODE_SLANTED_ROOF:  iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_ROOM;                         break;
03327                   case DRAW_MODE_DEBRIS:                    iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_DEBRIS;                       break;
03328                   case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS:                  iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_OSTRUCTS;               break;
03329                   case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS1:                 iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_OSTRUCTS1;        break;
03330                   case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS2:                 iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_OSTRUCTS2;        break;
03331                   case DRAW_MODE_BANKS:                           iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_BANKS;                        break;
03332                   case DRAW_MODE_ROADS:                           iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_ROADS;                        break;
03333 
03334                   case DRAW_MODE_CAVES:
03335                         if( gusSelectionType >= SMALLSELECTION && gusSelectionType <= XLARGESELECTION )
03336                               ProcessAreaSelection( FALSE );
03337                         break;
03338 
03339                   case DRAW_MODE_SMART_WALLS:   
03340                         EraseWalls( iMapIndex );
03341                         break;
03342                   case DRAW_MODE_SMART_BROKEN_WALLS:
03343                   case DRAW_MODE_SMART_WINDOWS:
03344                   case DRAW_MODE_SMART_DOORS:
03345                         RestoreWalls( iMapIndex );
03346                         break;
03347                   case DRAW_MODE_EXITGRID:
03348                         if( GetExitGrid( (UINT16)iMapIndex, &gExitGrid ) )
03349                               ApplyNewExitGridValuesToTextFields();
03350                         break;
03351                   default:
03352                         gfRenderWorld = fPrevState;
03353                         break;
03354             }
03355       }
03356       else if( !_LeftButtonDown && !gfFirstPlacement )
03357       {
03358             switch( iDrawMode )
03359             {
03360                   case DRAW_MODE_SCHEDULECONFIRM:
03361                         if( IsLocationSittableExcludingPeople( iMapIndex, FALSE ) )
03362                         {
03363                               RegisterCurrentScheduleAction( iMapIndex );
03364                         }
03365                         break;
03366                   case DRAW_MODE_COPY_BUILDING:
03367                         PasteBuilding( iMapIndex );
03368                         break;
03369                   case DRAW_MODE_MOVE_BUILDING:
03370                         MoveBuilding( iMapIndex );
03371                         break;
03372             }
03373       }
03374 }
03375 
03376 BOOLEAN DoIRenderASpecialMouseCursor()
03377 {
03378       INT16 sMouseX_M, sMouseY_M;
03379 
03380       // Draw basic mouse
03381       if ( GetMouseXY( &sMouseX_M, &sMouseY_M ) )
03382       {
03383             if ( (gsCursorGridNo = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sMouseY_M, sMouseX_M )) < 0x8000 )
03384             {
03385                   // Add basic cursor
03386                   //gBasicCursorNode = AddTopmostToTail( gsCursorGridNo, FIRSTPOINTERS1 );
03387             }
03388       }
03389 
03390       if ( iCurrentTaskbar != TASK_OPTIONS )
03391       {
03392             switch ( iDrawMode )
03393             {
03394                   case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS2:
03395                         if(CheckForFences())
03396                               fDontUseRandom = TRUE;
03397                   case DRAW_MODE_DEBRIS:                                      // These only show if you first hit PGUP/PGDOWN keys
03398                   case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS:
03399                   case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS1:
03400                         if(!fDontUseRandom)
03401                               break;            
03402                   case DRAW_MODE_BANKS:
03403                   case DRAW_MODE_ROADS:
03404                   case DRAW_MODE_WALLS:
03405                   case DRAW_MODE_DOORS:
03406                   case DRAW_MODE_WINDOWS:
03407                   case DRAW_MODE_ROOFS:
03408                   case DRAW_MODE_BROKEN_WALLS:
03409                   case DRAW_MODE_DECOR:
03410                   case DRAW_MODE_DECALS:
03411                   case DRAW_MODE_FLOORS:
03412                   case DRAW_MODE_TOILET:
03413 
03414                   case DRAW_MODE_SMART_WALLS:
03415                   case DRAW_MODE_SMART_DOORS:
03416                   case DRAW_MODE_SMART_WINDOWS:
03417                   case DRAW_MODE_SMART_BROKEN_WALLS:
03418                   case DRAW_MODE_ROOM:
03419                   case DRAW_MODE_NEWROOF:
03420                         return DrawTempMouseCursorObject( );      
03421 
03422                   default:
03423                         break;
03424             }
03425       }
03426       return FALSE;
03427 }

03433 void ShowEntryPoints()
03434 {
03435       //make entry points visible
03436       if( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo != -1 )
03437         AddTopmostToTail( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo, FIRSTPOINTERS2 );
03438       if( gMapInformation.sEastGridNo != -1 )
03439         AddTopmostToTail( gMapInformation.sEastGridNo, FIRSTPOINTERS2 );
03440       if( gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo != -1 )
03441         AddTopmostToTail( gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo, FIRSTPOINTERS2 );
03442       if( gMapInformation.sWestGridNo != -1 )
03443         AddTopmostToTail( gMapInformation.sWestGridNo, FIRSTPOINTERS2 );
03444 }
03445 
03446 void HideEntryPoints()
03447 {
03448       //remove entry point indicators
03449       if( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo != -1 )
03450             RemoveAllTopmostsOfTypeRange( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo, FIRSTPOINTERS, FIRSTPOINTERS );
03451       if( gMapInformation.sEastGridNo != -1 )
03452             RemoveAllTopmostsOfTypeRange( gMapInformation.sEastGridNo, FIRSTPOINTERS, FIRSTPOINTERS );
03453       if( gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo != -1 )
03454             RemoveAllTopmostsOfTypeRange( gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo, FIRSTPOINTERS, FIRSTPOINTERS );
03455       if( gMapInformation.sWestGridNo != -1 )
03456             RemoveAllTopmostsOfTypeRange( gMapInformation.sWestGridNo, FIRSTPOINTERS, FIRSTPOINTERS );
03457 }

03506 
03507 void ProcessAreaSelection( BOOLEAN fWithLeftButton )
03508 {
03509       BOOLEAN fPrevState = gfRenderWorld;
03510       gfRenderWorld = TRUE;
03511       switch( iDrawMode )
03512       {
03513             case DRAW_MODE_ROOM:
03514             case DRAW_MODE_SLANTED_ROOF:
03515                   AddBuildingSectionToWorld( &gSelectRegion );
03516                   break;
03517             case DRAW_MODE_SAW_ROOM:  
03518                   RemoveBuildingSectionFromWorld( &gSelectRegion );     
03519                   break;
03520             case DRAW_MODE_CAVES:
03521                   if( fWithLeftButton )
03522                         AddCaveSectionToWorld( &gSelectRegion );
03523                   else
03524                         RemoveCaveSectionFromWorld( &gSelectRegion );
03525                   break;
03526             case DRAW_MODE_ROOMNUM:
03527                   DrawObjectsBasedOnSelectionRegion();
03528                   if( gubCurrRoomNumber > 0 )
03529                   {
03530                         gubCurrRoomNumber++;
03531                         gubMaxRoomNumber++;
03532                         if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_BUILDINGS && TextInputMode() )
03533                         {
03534                               UINT16 str[4];
03535                               swprintf( str, L"%d", gubCurrRoomNumber );
03536                               SetInputFieldStringWith16BitString( 1, str );
03537                               SetActiveField( 0 );
03538                         }
03539                   }
03540                   break;
03541             case DRAW_MODE_EXITGRID:
03542             case DRAW_MODE_FLOORS:
03543             case DRAW_MODE_GROUND:
03544             case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS:
03545             case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS1:
03546             case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS2:
03547             case DRAW_MODE_DEBRIS:
03548                   //These aren't normally supported by area selection, so
03549                   //call the equivalent function that is normally associated with them.
03550                   DrawObjectsBasedOnSelectionRegion();
03551                   break;
03552             default:
03553                   gfRenderWorld = fPrevState;
03554                   break;
03555       }
03556 }
03557 
03558 //For any drawing modes that support large cursors, or even area selection, this function calls the 
03559 //appropriate paste function for every gridno within the cursor.  This is not used for functions that
03560 //rely completely on selection areas, such as buildings.
03561 void DrawObjectsBasedOnSelectionRegion()
03562 {
03563       INT32 x, y, iMapIndex;
03564       BOOLEAN fSkipTest;
03565 
03566       //Certain drawing modes are placed with 100% density.  Those cases are checked here,
03567       //so the density test can be skipped.
03568       fSkipTest = FALSE;
03569       if( gusSelectionType == SMALLSELECTION ||
03570               iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_GROUND || 
03571                   iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_FLOORS || 
03572               iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_ROOMNUM ||
03573                   iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_EXITGRID )
03574             fSkipTest = TRUE;
03575 
03576       //The reason why I process the region from top to bottom then to the right is
03577       //to even out the binary tree undo placements.  Otherwise, the placements within
03578       //the undo binary tree would alway choose the right branch because the imapindex is
03579       //always greater than the previously positioned one.
03580       //Process the cursor area
03581       for ( x = gSelectRegion.iLeft; x <= gSelectRegion.iRight; x++ )
03582       {
03583             //process the region from 
03584             for ( y = gSelectRegion.iTop; y <= (INT16)gSelectRegion.iBottom; y++ )
03585             {
03586                   if( fSkipTest || PerformDensityTest() )
03587                   {
03588                         iMapIndex = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( y, x );
03589                         switch( iDrawMode )
03590                         {
03591                               case DRAW_MODE_EXITGRID:  
03592                                     AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
03593                                     AddExitGridToWorld( iMapIndex, &gExitGrid );                
03594                                     AddTopmostToTail( (UINT16)iMapIndex, FIRSTPOINTERS8 );
03595                                     break;
03596                               case DRAW_MODE_DEBRIS:        PasteDebris( iMapIndex );                                                                             break;
03597                               case DRAW_MODE_FLOORS:        PasteSingleFloor( iMapIndex );                                                            break;
03598                               case DRAW_MODE_GROUND:        PasteTexture( iMapIndex );                                                                      break;
03599                               case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS:      PasteStructure( iMapIndex );                                                              break;
03600                               case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS1: PasteStructure1( iMapIndex );                                                                 break;
03601                               case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS2: PasteStructure2( iMapIndex );                                                                 break;
03602                               case DRAW_MODE_ROOMNUM:   PasteRoomNumber( iMapIndex, gubCurrRoomNumber );    break;
03603                               default: return; //no point in continuing...
03604                         }
03605                   }
03606             }
03607       }
03608 }
03609 
03610 extern void AutoLoadMap();
03611 
03612 //The main loop of the editor.
03613 UINT32  EditScreenHandle( void )
03614 {
03615       UINT32 uiRetVal;
03616       BOOLEAN fShowingCursor;
03617       StartFrameBufferRender();
03618 
03619       if( gfWorldLoaded && gMapInformation.ubMapVersion <= 7 && !gfCorruptMap )
03620       {
03621             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_RED, MSG_ERROR, L"Map data has just been corrupted.  Don't save, don't quit, get Kris!  If he's not here, save the map using a temp filename and document everything you just did, especially your last action!" );
03622             gfCorruptMap = TRUE;
03623       }
03624       if( gfWorldLoaded && gubScheduleID > 40 && !gfCorruptSchedules )
03625       {
03626             OptimizeSchedules();
03627             if( gubScheduleID > 32 )
03628             {
03629                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_RED, MSG_ERROR, L"Schedule data has just been corrupted.  Don't save, don't quit, get Kris!  If he's not here, save the map using a temp filename and document everything you just did, especially your last action!" );
03630                   gfCorruptSchedules = TRUE;
03631             }
03632       }
03633 
03634       if( gfAutoLoadA9 == 2 )
03635             AutoLoadMap();
03636       
03637       if ( fEditModeFirstTime )
03638       {
03639             EditModeInit( );
03640       }
03641 
03642       if ( InOverheadMap( ) && !gfSummaryWindowActive )
03643       {
03644             HandleOverheadMap( );
03645       }
03646 
03647       //Calculate general mouse information
03648       GetMouseXY( &sGridX, &sGridY );
03649       iMapIndex = sGridY * WORLD_COLS + sGridX;
03650 
03651       DetermineUndoState();
03652 
03653       fBeenWarned = FALSE;
03654 
03655       uiRetVal = EDIT_SCREEN;
03656 
03657       // Handle the bottom task bar menu.
03658       DoTaskbar();
03659 
03660       //Process the variety of popup menus, dialogs, etc. 
03661       
03662       if( gubMessageBoxStatus )
03663       {
03664             if( MessageBoxHandled( ) )
03665                   return ProcessEditscreenMessageBoxResponse();
03666             return EDIT_SCREEN;
03667       }
03668 
03669       if( ProcessPopupMenuIfActive() )
03670             return EDIT_SCREEN;
03671       if ( fHelpScreen )
03672             return( WaitForHelpScreenResponse( ) );
03673       if ( fSelectionWindow )
03674             return( WaitForSelectionWindowResponse( ) );
03675 
03676       // If editing mercs, handle that stuff
03677       ProcessMercEditing();
03678 
03679       EnsureStatusOfEditorButtons();
03680 
03681       // Handle scrolling of the map if needed
03682       if( !gfGotoGridNoUI && iDrawMode != DRAW_MODE_SHOW_TILESET && !gfSummaryWindowActive && 
03683                   !gfEditingDoor && !gfNoScroll && !InOverheadMap() )
03684             ScrollWorld();
03685 
03686       iCurrentAction = ACTION_NULL;
03687  
03688       UpdateCursorAreas();
03689 
03690       HandleMouseClicksInGameScreen();
03691 
03692       if( !gfFirstPlacement && !gfLeftButtonState )
03693             gfFirstPlacement = TRUE;
03694 
03695       //If we are copying or moving a building, we process, then delete the building layout immediately
03696       //after releasing the mouse button.  If released in the world, then the building would have been
03697       //processed in above function, HandleMouseClicksInGameScreen().
03698       if( !_LeftButtonDown && gpBuildingLayoutList )
03699             DeleteBuildingLayout();
03700 
03701       fShowingCursor = DoIRenderASpecialMouseCursor();
03702 
03703       DequeAllGameEvents( TRUE );
03704 
03705       if ( fBuildingShowRoomInfo )
03706       {
03707             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_ROOMIDS );          
03708       }     
03709 
03710       if ( gfRenderWorld )
03711       {
03712             if( gCursorNode )
03713                   gCursorNode->uiFlags &= (~LEVELNODE_REVEAL);
03714             
03715             // This flag is the beast that makes the renderer do everything
03716             MarkWorldDirty();
03717 
03718             gfRenderWorld = FALSE;
03719       }
03720 
03721       // The default here for the renderer is to just do dynamic stuff...
03722       if( !gfSummaryWindowActive && !gfEditingDoor && !InOverheadMap() )
03723             RenderWorld();
03724 
03725       DisplayWayPoints();
03726 
03727       if ( fShowingCursor )
03728             RemoveTempMouseCursorObject();
03729 
03730       ProcessEditorRendering();
03731 
03732       // Handle toolbar selections
03733       HandleJA2ToolbarSelection( );
03734 
03735       // Handle keyboard shortcuts / selections
03736       HandleKeyboardShortcuts( );
03737 
03738       // Perform action based on current selection
03739       if ( (uiRetVal = PerformSelectedAction( )) != EDIT_SCREEN )
03740             return( uiRetVal );
03741 
03742       // Display Framerate
03743       DisplayFrameRate( );
03744 
03745       // Handle video overlays, for FPS and screen message stuff
03746       if ( gfScrollPending )
03747       {
03748             AllocateVideoOverlaysArea( );
03749             SaveVideoOverlaysArea( FRAME_BUFFER );
03750       }
03751       ExecuteVideoOverlays( );
03752 
03753   ScrollString( );
03754 
03755       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
03756       EndFrameBufferRender( );
03757 
03758       return( uiRetVal );
03759 }
03760 
03761 void CreateGotoGridNoUI()
03762 {
03763       gfGotoGridNoUI = TRUE;
03764       //Disable the rest of the editor
03765       DisableEditorTaskbar();
03766       //Create the background panel.
03767       guiGotoGridNoUIButtonID =
03768             CreateTextButton( L"Enter gridno:", FONT10ARIAL, FONT_YELLOW, FONT_BLACK, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT,
03769             290, 155, 60, 50, BUTTON_NO_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
03770       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiGotoGridNoUIButtonID, DISABLED_STYLE_NONE );
03771       SpecifyButtonTextOffsets( guiGotoGridNoUIButtonID, 5, 5, FALSE );
03772       DisableButton( guiGotoGridNoUIButtonID );
03773       //Create a blanket region so nobody can use
03774       MSYS_DefineRegion( &GotoGridNoUIRegion, 0, 0, 640, 480,     MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL+1, 0, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
03775       //Init a text input field.
03776       InitTextInputModeWithScheme( DEFAULT_SCHEME );
03777       AddTextInputField( 300, 180, 40, 18, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, L"", 6, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
03778 }
03779 
03780 void RemoveGotoGridNoUI()
03781 {
03782       INT32 iMapIndex;
03783       gfGotoGridNoUI = FALSE;
03784       //Enable the rest of the editor
03785       EnableEditorTaskbar();
03786       RemoveButton( guiGotoGridNoUIButtonID );
03787       iMapIndex = GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 0 );
03788       KillTextInputMode();
03789       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &GotoGridNoUIRegion );
03790       if( iMapIndex != -1 )
03791       { //Warp the screen to the location of this gridno.
03792             CenterScreenAtMapIndex( iMapIndex );
03793       }
03794       else
03795       {
03796             MarkWorldDirty();
03797       }
03798 }
03799 
03800 void UpdateLastActionBeforeLeaving()
03801 {
03802       if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_MERCS )
03803             IndicateSelectedMerc( SELECT_NO_MERC );
03804       SpecifyItemToEdit( NULL, -1 );
03805 }
03806 
03807 void ReloadMap()
03808 {
03809       UINT16 szFilename[30];
03810       swprintf( szFilename, L"%S", gubFilename );
03811       ExternalLoadMap( szFilename );
03812 }

03822 }

03824 UINT32      EditScreenHandle( )
03825 {
03826       //If this screen ever gets set, then this is a bad thing -- endless loop
03827       return ERROR_SCREEN ;
03828 }

03832       return TRUE ;
